paraphrase_llama3: A poor performance can have lasting consequences.

src: Is it so ephemeral then?
mt: 这么短暂吗?
ref: 它真的稍纵即逝？
paraphrase_llama3: Does it last for only a short time?

src: Merely a "catchphrase" with no clear originator?
mt: 只是一个"流行语", 没有明确的发起人?
ref: 仅仅是一句没有明确出处的“口头禅”？
paraphrase_llama3: Is this phrase a mere slogan with no known creator?

src: Smoky, my 10 month old male Domestic Blue kitten, playing with a red rubber Apple Pencil comfort device bought from Amazon he absconded months ago.
mt: 我10个月大的雄性猫猫, 玩着从亚马逊购买的红果笔,
ref: Smoky，我的 10 个月大的雄性家养蓝色小猫，正在玩一个红色胶制苹果笔，它是几个月前从 Amazon 上买的便利设备，后来不见了。
paraphrase_llama3: My 10-month-old Domestic Blue kitten, Smoky, has been playing with a red rubber toy he got from Amazon months ago.

src: He carries it in his mouth proudly all over the house, and I just have to laugh inwardly.
mt: 他把它带在嘴里骄傲的房子, 我只是必须笑在内心.
ref: 他骄傲地叼着它满屋跑，我只能暗自发笑。
paraphrase_llama3: With a triumphant air, he proudly carries it in his mouth, and I can't help but chuckle to myself as I watch him do it all over the hous

src: Every time I see him do it.
mt: 每次我看到他这样做.
ref: 每次我看到他都在玩它。
paraphrase_llama3: Each time I witness him performing that actio

src: Have now done a full round trip on the new ICNG train.
mt: 现在已经在新ICNG列车上完成了全面的往返.
ref: 我现在已经在新 ICNG 列车上完成了一次完整的往返旅行。
paraphrase_llama3: Completed a full circuit on the new ICNG train.

src: I really like it.
mt: 我真的很喜欢它.
ref: 我很喜欢这个列车。
paraphrase_llama3: It is one of my favorites.

src: Esp the carriages with the bigger windows.
mt: 尤其是那些窗户更大的车.
ref: 尤其是车厢窗户很大。
paraphrase_llama3: Use the carriages with larger windows.

src: There's areas that could use some polish.
mt: 有一些地方需要磨光.
ref: 有些地方有待提高。
paraphrase_llama3: Some regions require refinement.

src: Namely the lack of enough bins, and the lack of signs to explain the significance of the lighting colours.
mt: 尤其是缺乏足够的垃圾, 缺乏解释灯光颜色意义的标志.
ref: 比如，垃圾箱不足，并且缺少指示灯光颜色所代表的意义的标志。
paraphrase_llama3: The problem lies in the insufficient provision of waste bins and unclear signage regarding the meaning of the lighting colour

src: Fix those minor issues, and then can we have more of these please?
mt: 解决这些小问题,然后我们可以有更多的这些请?
ref: 解决这些小问题，然后我们还会有更多这样的小问题吗？
paraphrase_llama3: Once you've addressed the minor issues, can we have more of these?

src: I won't be sad to see the end of the ICM or DDZ stock.
mt: 我不会因为ICM或DDZ股票的消失而感到悲伤.
ref: 看到 ICM 或 DDZ 股票的终结，我并不会感到难过。
paraphrase_llama3: I'm not looking forward to the closure of ICM or DDZ stock.

src: One per customer rules remain as we try to ensure everyone who queues up can get their hands on a board.
mt: 为了确保每位排队的人都能得到一个板.
ref: 人手一个的规则仍然存在，因为我们试图确保每个排队的人都可以得到一个板。
paraphrase_llama3: To prevent overcrowding, we have a limit of one board per customer, allowing everyone in line to get their desired item.

src: You can buy ONE of the boards listed above, not one of each.
mt: 您可以购买上述板中的一块,而不是每一个.
ref: 你可以买上面列出的一种板，而不是每种各买一个。
paraphrase_llama3: You are allowed to purchase only one board from the options provided, not multiple ones.

src: There are no buying restrictions on Picos or other merchandise.
mt: 对于皮科或其他商品, 没有购买限制.
ref: Picos 或其他商品没有购买限制。
paraphrase_llama3: You can purchase Picos or other items without any limitations.

src: Yesterday I had the best time with my friend and former rabbi colleague.
mt: 现在我知道我在哪里.
ref: 昨天我和我的朋友也是之前的拉比同事玩得很开心。
paraphrase_llama3: Yesterday, I spent a fantastic day with a dear friend and a former colleague who was also a rabbi.

src: We visited for a couple hours on my porch.
mt: 我们在门廊上拜访了几个小时.
ref: 在我的走廊，我们一同度过了几个小时。
paraphrase_llama3: I invited my friend over for a few hours, and we spent some time chatting on my porch.

src: Such friendships transcend differences.
mt: 这种友超越了我们的差异.
ref: 我们的友谊跨越了差异。
paraphrase_llama3: These bonds go beyond the boundaries of differences.

src: We all have stories to tell.
mt: 我们都有故事要讲.
ref: 我们都有相告彼此的故事。
paraphrase_llama3: Every individual has a unique narrative to share.

src: The Lord bless you and keep you!
mt: 愿上帝保佑你,保护你!
ref: 上帝保佑你，祝福你！
paraphrase_llama3: May the divine force watch over and protect you!

src: And the marsh is greening up.
mt: 沼泽也开始变绿.
ref: 并且沼泽地正在变成绿色。
paraphrase_llama3: The marsh is transforming into a lush green landscap

src: I quite like akkoma the software and the domain name I got for my instance.
mt: 我很喜欢软件和域名.
ref: 我很喜欢 akkoma 软件还有我为我的实例申请的域名。
paraphrase_llama3: I am quite fond of the Akkoma software and the domain name I acquired for my instance.

src: But I feel somehow I started this instance on the wrong foot, so to speak.
mt: 但我觉得我开始这个案例的错误,可以这么说.
ref: 但我觉得不知何故，我一开始就走错了路，可以这么说。
paraphrase_llama3: I have a sense that I made a mistake right from the beginning.

src: And I never got comfy there.
mt: 我从来没有感到舒服.
ref: 我在那里一直觉得不舒服。
paraphrase_llama3: I never felt at ease in that plac

src: Will still linger a bit longer on here and think about whether I should migrate at all.
mt: 现在我还是想想, 我是否应该迁移.
ref: 我仍然会在这里多逗留一会儿，考虑我是否应该迁移。
paraphrase_llama3: I'll take a little more time to weigh the pros and cons before deciding whether to make the switc

src: #FalconGameBooks
mt: 现在我们可以看到
ref: #FalconGameBooks
paraphrase_llama3: A series of books that explore the world of Falcon, a popular video game.

src: The eight-eyed Repnids seem to be watching as you settle the flyer down on the red soil, but they make no move towards you, in fact they are motionless as you climb out of the flyer and walk slowly towards them.
mt: 八眼的爬行动物似乎在看着你把飞行器放在红色的土壤上, 但他们没有向你移动, 事实上,当你爬出飞行器,慢慢走向他们时, 他们是不动的.
ref: 当你把飞行器停在红土上时，八眼 Repnid 似乎在看着你，但它们不会向你移动，事实上，当你爬出飞行器，慢慢走向它们时，它们是一动不动的。
paraphrase_llama3: The Repnids with their eight eyes appear to be observing as you gently place the flyer on the reddish soil. They remain still, not making any attempt to approach you, as you exit the flyer and approach them cautiousl

src: The ground beneath your feet begins to tremble and then shake, as if in an earthquake and you lose your footing, though the Repnids seem unaffected.
mt: 像地震一样, 你失去立足,
ref: 尽管 Repnid 看似没有受到影响，你脚下的地面开始震颤，然后摇晃，像是地震，你站不稳。
paraphrase_llama3: The earth beneath your feet starts to rumble and then convulse, as if an earthquake has struck, and you struggle to keep your balance, while the Repnids appear completely unbothered.

src: The rock beneath you gives way suddenly.
mt: 下面的岩石突然崩塌了.
ref: 你脚下的岩石突然坍塌了。
paraphrase_llama3: The ground beneath your feet collapses unexpectedly.

src: Repnids have tunnelled below the surface and you fall into a boiling mass of hundreds of Repnid bodies in a cavern below.
mt: 爬虫类在地表下挖掘了道, 你就会入一座洞穴里,
ref: Repnid 在地表下挖了一条隧道，你掉进了下面的一个洞穴里，里面有一堆挤满整个洞穴的 Repnid 尸体。
paraphrase_llama3: As you descend, you suddenly find yourself surrounded by a scorching sea of Repnid creatures, their bodies piled high in a subterranean caver

src: The end is swift, as several pairs of fangs inject their deadly venom and the air of Dyskra contaminates your lungs.
mt: 几对牙注入了致命的毒液,
ref: 很快就到结局了，几对尖牙喷射出致命的毒液，Dyskra 的空气污染了你的肺部。
paraphrase_llama3: The demise is sudden, as venomous bites and toxic air swiftly claim your life.

src: Nobody will ever know that you were the first human future traveller.
mt: 没有人会知道你是第一个未来人类旅行者.
ref: 没人会知道你是第一位人类未来旅行者。
paraphrase_llama3: Your secret of being the pioneer of intertemporal travel will remain forever hidden.

src: You land the flyer nose upward on the side of the slag heap and climb out.
mt: 飞行员的鼻子向上降落在废渣堆的一侧,然后爬出来.
ref: 你将飞行器机头朝上降落在矿渣堆的一侧，然后爬出来。
paraphrase_llama3: You bring the flyer to a stop on the side of the slag heap, and then exit the aircraft.

src: The eight-eyed Repnids seem to be watching, but they make no move towards you, in fact they are motionless as you walk slowly towards them.
mt: 八眼的爬行动物似乎在看着你, 但他们没有向你移动,
ref: 八眼 Repnid 似乎在看着你，但它们不会向你移动，事实上，当你慢慢走向它们时，它们是静止的。
paraphrase_llama3: The eight-eyed Repnids appear to be observing, yet they remain still, their gaze fixed on you as you approach them, neither advancing nor retreatin

src: You halt while still on the mound of crumbled rock and soil and speak to them, saying, 'I come in peace, as a friend.'
mt: 你站在碎石和土堆上,对他们说:'我来是为了和平,作为朋友.
ref: 当你仍然站在碎石和泥土的土堆上时，你停下来对他们说，我是为和平而来的，是你们的朋友。
paraphrase_llama3: You pause on the rocky terrain, addressing them with a message of peaceful intentions, 'I mean no harm, I'm here to befriend you.'

src: It appears that they cannot hear you, let alone understand, as your Universal Translator picks up no answer.
mt: 似乎他们听不到, 更不用说理解, 因为你的通用翻译器没有接收到任何答案.
ref: 他们似乎听不到你的话，更不用说理解了，因为你的通用翻译器没有得到任何回答。
paraphrase_llama3: It seems they're not responding, and even the Universal Translator is unable to detect any feedback.

src: You decide to use your Psychic Awareness to contact them mentally.
mt: 你决定使用你的心灵意识与他们精神联系.
ref: 你决定用你的通灵意识通过意识与他们沟通。
paraphrase_llama3: You focus your mind to connect with them telepathically.

src: It is difficult to make sense of their thoughts; they are terrifyingly alien and your mind recoils from the contact.
mt: 很难理解他们的想法; 他们是可怕的异国, 你的思想从接触中退缩.
ref: 很难理解他们的想法；他们是可怕的异类，你的思维在沟通中适得其反。
paraphrase_llama3: Their thoughts are incomprehensible and unsettling, as if they are from a different planet, making it hard to connect with the

src: You decide that establishing contact again would be dangerous and return to your flyer, but the experience has cleared your mind which had been befuddled ever since you jumped into the future.
mt: 你决定重新建立联系是危险的,回到你的飞行器, 但经验已经清除了你的头脑,
ref: 你想到，再次建立沟通会很危险，然后你回到你的飞行器上，但是这一经历已经清除了你的头脑，自从你跳入未来以来，你的头脑一直是混乱的。
paraphrase_llama3: You realize that re-establishing contact could be risky and opt to return to your flyer, but the ordeal has left you mentally refreshed and clear-headed, having been clouded by the disorienting effects of time trave

src: Once back in Falcon's Wing you find it quite easy to plot a course for Earth in 3034 AD.
mt: 现在,我们可以很容易地为地球定位在公元3034年.
ref: 一旦回到猎鹰之翼，你会发现很容易绘制出公元 3034 年地球的路线。
paraphrase_llama3: Once you return to Falcon's Wing, you'll find it relatively simple to chart a course for Earth in the year 3034 A

src: Note that you have used up another polybdenum rod as you jump.
mt: 需要注意的是,
ref: 注意，当你跳跃的时候，你已经用完了另一根聚钼棒。
paraphrase_llama3: As you jump, you've used up yet another polybdenum rod.

src: [cont'd]
mt: [继续]
paraphrase_llama3: [cont'd]

src: #today I have coffee, sunshine and quiet time!
mt: 今天我喝咖啡,阳光和安静的时间!
ref: #今天我享受着咖啡、阳光和安静的时光带来的体验！
paraphrase_llama3: #I'm treating myself to a lovely morning with a cup of coffee, warm sunshine, and a peaceful atmosphere.

src: I started a new shawl.
mt: 我开始了新的披肩.
ref: 我开始做新披肩。
paraphrase_llama3: I began knitting a new shawl.

src: I am unsure of it at this time.
mt: 我现在不确定.
ref: 我现在还不确定。
paraphrase_llama3: I need more information before making a decision.

src: I found a unevenly spun silver gray yarn that is mostly finely spun with lumps.
mt: 我发现一根不均的银灰色线,
ref: 我发现了一种纺得不均匀的银灰色纱线，这种纱线大多纺得很细，带有结块。
paraphrase_llama3: I discovered a yarn with a rough texture, mostly smooth but with some thick, irregular parts.

src: I plan on mixing it with a fine purple/lilac variegated cotton.
mt: 我打算将其与紫色/紫色的棉花混合.
ref: 我打算把它和一种上好的紫色/淡紫色杂色棉混合在一起。
paraphrase_llama3: I intend to blend the material with a high-quality cotton that has a beautiful purple and lilac color patter

src: But am not sure I have enough of the purple.
mt: 但我不确定我有足够的紫色.
ref: 但我不确定我有足够的紫色。
paraphrase_llama3: I'm not certain I possess sufficient purple to complete the task.

src: I am using a H hook with a similar double crochet pattern as I have done before.
mt: 我使用的是一个H,
ref: 我用了一个 H 型钩，和我以前用过的类似的双钩针图案。
paraphrase_llama3: I'm repeating a familiar crochet pattern using a H hoo

src: I made the first join last night so we shall see.
mt: 我昨晚做了第一笔,我们将会看到.
ref: 我昨晚第一个加入，所以我们拭目以待。
paraphrase_llama3: I completed the first task yesterday, and now we'll wait and see the outcome.

src: Wishing everyone a happy Thursday!
mt: 祝大家一个愉快的星期四!
ref: 祝大家周四快乐！
paraphrase_llama3: May the rest of your week be filled with joy and positivit

src: However, I hate classes on fine arts and literature, and my school history bears it out.
mt: 我不喜欢艺术和文学课,
ref: 但是，我不喜欢美术和文学课，我的求学历程可以证明这一点。
paraphrase_llama3: Despite my dislike for classes on fine arts and literature, my academic record reflects my sentiment

src: I have literally tried and dropped EVERY SINGLE ONE.
mt: 我已经试过,
ref: 我真的试过了，每一科都丢了。
paraphrase_llama3: I have attempted and rejected each and every on

src: And up until like two years ago, I had no idea until I checked my transcripts.
mt: 直到两年前, 我才知道, 直到我查看了我的成绩单.
ref: 直到两年前，看了我的成绩单，我才知道。
paraphrase_llama3: Until about two years ago, I was unaware of the information on my transcripts until I reviewed them.

src: The literature class hatred is even worse: I love to read.
mt: 文学课上的仇恨甚至更糟:我喜欢阅读.
ref: 我对文学课的厌恶更不可一世：我喜欢读书。
paraphrase_llama3: The disdain for literature is palpable in that class, but I find joy in reading.

src: I hit most of the classics before eighteen--though that's more a reflection of living in bumfuck nowhere, I also read the 1979 Encyclopedia Brittanica in desperation.
mt: 我在18岁之前读过大部分经典作品, 虽然这更像是生活在一个无处不在的世界,
ref: 18 岁前，我接触了大部分经典著作——尽管这一点更能印证我生活在一个不知名的地方，而我又身披绝望地去读了 1979 年的大英百科全书。
paraphrase_llama3: I managed to read most of the classic books before I turned 18, which is partly due to being raised in a remote area, and I also spent my time reading the 1979 Encyclopedia Britannica out of boredom.

src: My home is comfortable and wonderful and I am happy there, but I have to be somewhere else in order to chill enough to read fiction during the day without feeling guilty.
mt: 我家很舒服,很美好,我很高兴,
ref: 我在我的家过得很舒适而且曾是美好的回忆，生活在那里我很开心，但我必须来到这里，才能在白天放松下来读小说而不会感到内疚。
paraphrase_llama3: My home is a haven where I feel content and joyful, but I need to be elsewhere to fully unwind and indulge in my love of reading fiction without the guilt of neglecting my responsibilitie

src: It's like I'm on holidays and therefore am doing what one does on holidays.
mt: 现在我好像在度假, 于是我做了假期的事情.
ref: 就好像我在度假，理所应当我要做度假应该做的事。
paraphrase_llama3: I'm in a relaxed state, doing things I'd normally do on a vacation.

src: And that's also even though I haven't slept as well here for the last two nights as I do at home, and get a little #MECFS ed out from simply being in a strange environment where I'm less able to pace myself and have to remember where things are.
mt: 虽然我在过去两晚的睡眠不如我在家的睡眠, 只是因为在陌生的环境中,
ref: 尽管在过去的两个晚上，我在这里睡得没有在家里睡得好，在一个陌生的环境中，我感到有点不舒服，因为我不能调整自己的节奏，而且必须记住东西都放在何处。
paraphrase_llama3: Although I'm not sleeping well here, and my ME/CFS is acting up due to the unfamiliar surroundings and lack of control over my daily routine, I'm still managing to cop

src: And that's also even though I do still have my to-do list and am organising my life as well.
mt: 尽管我仍然有我的待办事项清单,
ref: 尽管我仍然有我要做的一大堆事情，也在安排我的生活。
paraphrase_llama3: Despite having a to-do list and organizing my life, I still have time for other things to

src: Humanity is out in 5 days.
mt: 人类将在5天内离开.
ref: 《Humanity》五天后发布。
paraphrase_llama3: The world is on the brink of a catastrophic event, with only a few days left to prevent i

src: It's exciting, nerve-wracking, stressful, and all the good things that I love about working in games.
mt: 激动人心,令人紧张,压力, 以及我喜欢在游戏工作的所有好东西.
ref: 这是令人兴奋、令人紧张的，也是有压力的，还有个好处就是，我喜欢在游戏中享受工作。
paraphrase_llama3: Working in games is an exhilarating experience that combines my love for the thrill and pressure of the job.

src: What will people think of it?
mt: 人们会怎么看?
ref: 大家会怎么看？
paraphrase_llama3: How will others perceive this?

src: I like it but will it be able to attract an audience of the right players?
mt: 我喜欢它,但它能吸引到合适的观众吗?
ref: 我喜欢它，但它能吸引合适玩家的观众吗？
paraphrase_llama3: Can this appeal to the desired group of players?

src: Will a community blossom around the user-generated content piece of the game?
mt: 游戏的用户生成内容会让社区勃发展吗?
ref: 围绕用户生成的游戏内容，会有社区爆火吗？
paraphrase_llama3: Will a community develop around the user-generated content piece of the game?

src: (I am really hoping so.)
mt: (我真的希望如此.)
ref: （我确实希望如此。）
paraphrase_llama3: (I am really optimistic about it.)

src: The game's story, ideas and questions it inspires feel timely.
mt: 游戏的故事,想法和问题都很及时.
ref: 这个游戏的故事、灵感及其激发的问题感觉很符合时宜。
paraphrase_llama3: The game's narrative and the thoughts it evokes are remarkably relevant to the current er

src: Hoping things go well.
mt: 希望一切顺利.
ref: 希望进展顺利。
paraphrase_llama3: Let's hope everything turns out smoothly.

src: It's ThinkPad day!!
mt: 这是一个ThinkPad日!
ref: 今天是 ThinkPad 日！！
paraphrase_llama3: Today is a special day for ThinkPad fan

src: Came home on my lunch break to see this sitting outside uwu.
mt: 午休时回家, 看到这张照片在乌乌外面.
ref: 我在午休时回到家，在威斯康辛大学外面看到这句话。
paraphrase_llama3: I took a break from work to go home and found this adorable thing waiting outside for me.

src: Wish I could take it back to work with me to setup more.
mt: 愿我能带回工作, 准备更多.
ref: 希望我可以把它带回去和我一起工作，创造更多可能。
paraphrase_llama3: I wish I could bring it to the office to set it up for further use.

src: But that will have to wait till tonight.
mt: 但这将不得不等到今晚.
ref: 但那要等到今晚。
paraphrase_llama3: We will have to put it off until this evening.

src: So I finally watched #Heartstopper
mt: 于是我终于看到了"心脏"
ref: 然后我终于观看了 #Heartstopper
paraphrase_llama3: I finally had the chance to watch the popular show #Heartstopper.

src: Was it overly cute to the point of being twee?
mt: 没有过于可爱,
ref: 是不是太可爱了以至于有点矫情？
paraphrase_llama3: Was it too sweet and endearing to the point of being overly sentimental?

src: Most definitely
mt: 绝对可以
ref: 必须的
paraphrase_llama3: Without a doubt

src: Do any of these characters talk human beings?
mt: 这些人物有没有说人类话?
ref: 这些角色中有会说话的人吗？
paraphrase_llama3: Can any of these characters communicate with humans?

src: Not even remotely
mt: 没有任何
ref: 一个也没有
paraphrase_llama3: Not even slightly

src: But did I love it?
mt: 我喜欢它吗?
ref: 但是我喜欢吗？
paraphrase_llama3: Was I truly fond of i

src: Absolutely!
mt: 绝对可以!
ref: 必须的！
paraphrase_llama3: Without a doub

src: what was Olivia Coleman doing here?
mt: 奥利维亚·科尔曼在这里做什么?
ref: Olivia Coleman 在这里做什么？
paraphrase_llama3: Why was Olivia Coleman present at this event?

src: Did she owe someone money?
mt: 她欠了任何人钱吗?
ref: 她欠谁钱了吗？
paraphrase_llama3: Was there a debt owed by her to someone?

src: Had a recent graduate artist take some critique badly tonight.
mt: 今晚有一位新毕业的艺术家受到了一些严厉的批评.
ref: 今晚一位刚毕业的艺人遭到一些批评。
paraphrase_llama3: A young artist who had recently finished their studies reacted negatively to some criticism they received last nigh

src: In part, because they'd be taught badly.
mt: 部分原因是因为他们被教得不好.
ref: 部分原因是因为他们没有受到良好的教育。
paraphrase_llama3: Due to the fact that they would receive inadequate instruction.

src: But it's important to not make excuses for issues and just fix them, especially in production when your lead needs changes.
mt: 尤其是在生产中, 当领导需要更换时.
ref: 但重要的是，没有借口，只需去解决它，尤其是在生产中，你的领导要求改变时。
paraphrase_llama3: It's crucial to tackle problems head-on, rather than making excuses, especially in production environments where changes to the lead are critical.

src: Especially with the competition.
mt: 尤其是竞争对手.
ref: 尤其是在竞争激烈的时候。
paraphrase_llama3: Especially considering the competition.

src: Every artist has been there, made the same mistakes.
mt: 每个艺术家都经历过,
ref: 每个艺人都经历过，犯过相同的错误。
paraphrase_llama3: Artists have all been through a similar experience, committing the same errors.

src: Good critique is there to correct the problem quickly, and isn't directed at your ability.
mt: 良好的批评是为了快速纠正问题,
ref: 好的评判是为了让你快速改变错误的做法，而不是针对你的能力。
paraphrase_llama3: Constructive feedback is meant to address the issue promptly, focusing on the issue rather than attacking your skill

src: It's assuming you have the ability to fix the problem, or find a solution.
mt: 假设你有能力解决问题,或者找到解决方案.
ref: 如果你有能力解决问题，或者可以找到解决方案。
paraphrase_llama3: It's assuming that you have the capacity to resolve the issue or identify a solution.

src: So while composting and bloom scrolling are a wonderful reminder to look up, and be aware of life beyond the screen.
mt: 让我们提醒自己, 关注屏幕之外的生命.
ref: 那么，虽然为了花开去堆肥是善意提醒，让我们抬起头来，看看屏幕之外的生活。
paraphrase_llama3: As we engage in composting and scrolling through social media, we are reminded to take a break from the screen and appreciate the world beyond.

src: It is as important to explore servers and IP addresses.
mt: 探索服务器和IP地址同样重要.
ref: 同样重要的是探索服务器和 IP 地址。
paraphrase_llama3: Understanding the infrastructure behind a network is equally crucial.

src: Watch seeds being sown & cultivated (and not randomly scattered) by good peeps.
mt: 观看种子被种植和培养 (而不是随机散布)
ref: 观看种子被善良的人们播种和培育（而不是随意散播）。
paraphrase_llama3: Witness the deliberate planting and nurturing of seeds by responsible individuals.

src: These roots are hidden.
mt: 这些根是隐藏的.
ref: 这些根被隐藏起来。
paraphrase_llama3: The roots are concealed from view.

src: Work is not visible.
mt: 工作是看不到的.
ref: 工作看不到结果。
paraphrase_llama3: There is no tangible evidence of work being done.

src: But for strong and firm future growth.
mt: 只有强大而坚定的未来增长.
ref: 但是，这都是为了以后的茁壮成长。
paraphrase_llama3: Only through a robust and unwavering foundation can we build a sustainable future.

src: Jami slipped the note to him when they passed each other on the path, just before the dog watch.
mt: 杰米在路上相遇时把这张纸条给了他,
ref: 当 Jami 与他在小路上擦肩而过时，就在看门狗面前，Jami 悄悄把纸条塞给他。
paraphrase_llama3: As they crossed each other's path, Jami discreetly handed him a note, just before the start of the dog watc

src: She was on her way to the wall, he was coming off duty.
mt: 她在去墙上,他正在下班.
ref: 她快走到墙角时，他下班了。
paraphrase_llama3: She was heading towards the wall, while he was finishing his shift.

src: He glanced behind him to watch her go, and to make sure they hadn't been seen.
mt: 他看了一眼在他身后看她走,并确保他们没有被看到.
ref: 他向后看了一眼，看着她离开，以确保他们没有被看到。
paraphrase_llama3: He turned around to catch a glimpse of her as she left, and to confirm that they hadn't been noticed.

src: She did not look back.
mt: 她没有回头看.
ref: 她没有回头。
paraphrase_llama3: She continued forward without a glance.

src: He waited until he was in the darkness of the bunk room before he pulled the note out and read it in a beam of light coming through the blackout curtains.
mt: 他等到自己进入卧室的黑暗, 然后他拿出这张纸条,
ref: 他一直在宿舍等到天黑，才抽出纸条，在透过遮光窗帘射进来的一束光线下读了起来。
paraphrase_llama3: As he entered the dimly lit bunk room, he hesitated before extracting the note and reading it under the faint glow of the blackout curtains.

src: One block-printed word.
mt: 一个字母印刷.
ref: 一个印刷体字。
paraphrase_llama3: A single word printed on a block.

src: He spent a long time staring at it, trying to stay calm:
mt: 他花了很长时间着它,试图保持冷静:
ref: 他花了很长时间盯着它，努力保持冷静：
paraphrase_llama3: He gazed at it for a while, attempting to compose himself.

src: I've met some marvelous new #Mastodon mates lately and want to maintain the trend.
mt: 我最近遇到了一些奇妙的新#Mastodon伴侣,
ref: 我最近新遇到一些非常厉害的 #Mastodon 伙伴，我想继续结识一些这样的人。
paraphrase_llama3: I've recently made some fantastic connections on Mastodon and I'm eager to continue this momentum.

src: Calling into the #Fediverse makes me feel like a whale singing through the vast ocean!
mt: 让我感觉像鱼在广的海洋中唱歌!
ref: 在 #Fediverse 中呼唤，让我觉得自己像一头鲸鱼一样，在浩瀚的海洋中高歌！
paraphrase_llama3: Connecting with the #Fediverse is like belting out a tune across the vast digital sea.

src: Want to join my "pod"?
mt: 想加入我的""?
ref: 想加入我的“pod”吗？
paraphrase_llama3: Are you interested in being part of my group?

src: I'd particularly like to connect with more.
mt: 我特别想与更多人联系.
ref: 我特别想和更多人联系。
paraphrase_llama3: I'm eager to build a stronger connection with others.

src: Everyone with their hair on fire about CNN can thank Stephen Colbert for the hard right turn.
mt: 任何对CNN感到愤怒的人都可以感谢史蒂芬·科尔伯特的转向.
ref: 对 CNN 表示愤怒的所有人都应该感谢史蒂芬·考伯特满舵右转。
paraphrase_llama3: The heated debate about CNN can be attributed to the influence of Stephen Colbert's conservative views.

src: He helped make Chris Licht a national problem.
mt: 他帮助克里斯·利希特成为全国性的问题.
ref: 他助力 Chris Licht 成为全国焦点。
paraphrase_llama3: He contributed to Chris Licht becoming a national concer

src: Much as we might like some folks, if they are just providing a minor league career to fascists, they probably should wear it.
mt: 尽管我们可能喜欢一些人,
ref: 尽管我们可能喜欢一些人，但如果他们只是为法西斯分子提供一个小联盟事业，他们可能会接受这份事业。
paraphrase_llama3: We may admire some individuals, but if they are giving a platform to far-right extremists, it's better if they don't do so.

src: This was the first time (but won't be the last) that Kaveesha Dilhari has both scored 20+ runs & taken 2+ wickets in the same T20I.
mt: 这也是第一次 (但不会是最后一次) 卡维沙·迪尔哈里在同一场T20I中同时打出20+的进球和2+的门.
ref: 这是 Kaveesha Dilhari 第一次（但不会是最后一次）在同一场 T20I 比赛中同时获得 20+ 分和 2+ 分。
paraphrase_llama3: Kaveesha Dilhari achieved a rare feat, marking her debut in a double performance in T20I cricket.

src: She joins a select group of Sri Lankan women to have achieved the all-round feat in the format.
mt: 她加入了斯里兰卡女性的精选群体, 在格式中取得了全方位的成就.
ref: 她加入了一个精心挑选的斯里兰卡女子团体，实现了全能的壮举。
paraphrase_llama3: She becomes part of an exclusive club of Sri Lankan women who have accomplished a remarkable achievement in the format.

src: Police arrest 15 after violent protest outside UK refugee hotel
mt: 警方在英国难民酒店外的暴力抗议活动后逮捕15人
ref: 在英国的难民旅馆外的暴力抗议结束后，警察逮捕了 15 人
paraphrase_llama3: Fifteen individuals were detained by the police following a tumultuous demonstration outside a facility housing refugees in the UK.

src: The incident comes after increase in numbers of refugees and asylum seekers crossing the Channel to the UK in boats.
mt: 难民和寻求庇护者越过英吉利海峡的船只数量增加后发生了这一事件.
ref: 在越来越多的难民和寻求庇护者乘船穿越英吉利海峡前往英国之后，发生了这一事件。
paraphrase_llama3: In recent times, a surge in the number of refugees and asylum seekers attempting to reach the UK by boat has led to a significant incident.

src: Police have arrested 15 people after an anti-refugee demonstration outside a hotel used to house asylum seekers turned violent near the English city of Liverpool.
mt: 警方在利物浦附近的酒店外举行反难民示威活动,
ref: 在英国城市利物浦附近，一家用于收容寻求庇护者的酒店外的反难民示威演变成暴力冲突后，警方逮捕了 15 人。
paraphrase_llama3: Following an anti-refugee protest near Liverpool, 15 individuals were taken into custody after the gathering turned chaotic and violent.

src: The Merseyside Police department said a police officer and two civilians sustained minor injuries during the disturbance on Friday night in Knowsley.
mt: 默西塞德警察局表示,一名警察和两名平民在周五晚上在诺斯利发生骚乱时受轻伤.
ref: 默西塞德郡警察局表示，周五晚上，在诺斯利的骚乱中，一名警察和两名平民受了轻伤。
paraphrase_llama3: A police officer and two civilians were injured in a disturbance in Knowsley on Friday night, with the injuries being minor.

src: The police force said some protesters threw objects and set a police van on fire.
mt: 警方表示,
ref: 警方表示，一些抗议者投掷物品，并点燃了一辆警车。
paraphrase_llama3: The authorities claimed that some demonstrators hurled objects and torched a police vehicle.

src: The people arrested, who ranged in age from 13 to 54, were detained "following violent disorder."
mt: 逮捕的年龄在13岁至54岁之间,
ref: 被捕的人年龄从 13 岁到 54 岁不等，“在暴力骚乱后”被拘留。
paraphrase_llama3: A group of people, spanning ages from 13 to 54, were taken into custody after engaging in violent behavio

src: Merseyside police commissioner Emily Spurrell told Radio City, "It was incredibly dangerous and there were a couple of injuries amongst the police officers."
mt: 梅西塞德警察局长艾米丽·斯普雷尔告诉广播城市",这是非常危险的,
ref: 默西塞德郡警察局长 Emily Spurrell 告诉 Radio City，“当时非常危险，有几名警察受伤。”
paraphrase_llama3: The police commissioner revealed that the situation was extremely perilous, resulting in a few officers sustaining injurie

src: The Home Office has been using the hotel to temporarily house asylum seekers since last year, according to local media.
mt: 据当地媒体报道, 自去年以来, 国内政部一直在使用这家酒店临时收容寻求庇护者.
ref: 据当地媒体报道，自去年以来，内政部一直在这家酒店临时安置寻求庇护者。
paraphrase_llama3: Since last year, the Home Office has been accommodating asylum seekers at a hotel, as reported by local medi

src: George Howarth, who represents Knowsley in the UK Parliament, said the violence on Friday night did not reflect the community.
mt: 代表诺斯利的乔治·霍华斯说, 星期五晚上的暴力事件并不反映社区.
ref: 在英国议会代表 Knowsley 的 George Howarth 表示，周五晚上的暴力事件并没有反映出社区的情况。
paraphrase_llama3: The local MP, George Howarth, stated that the violent incidents on Friday night did not accurately represent the community he represent

src: "The people of Knowsley are not bigots and are welcoming to people escaping from some of the most dangerous places in the world in search of a place of safety," he said.
mt: 肯斯利的人民不是偏执派,
ref: 他说：“诺思利的人们并不偏执，他们欢迎人们逃离世界上最危险的地方，寻找一个安全的地方。”
paraphrase_llama3: "The Knowsley community is known for its open-mindedness and willingness to provide a safe haven to those fleeing from war-torn or unstable regions, seeking refuge from the dangers they've faced."

src: "Those demonstrating against refugees at this protest tonight do not represent this community."
mt: "今晚抗议难民的人不代表这个社区.
ref: “在今晚的抗议活动中，那些反对难民的人并不代表这个社区。”
paraphrase_llama3: "The protesters opposing refugees tonight do not reflect the values of this community."

src: The protest took place amid heightened tensions as growing numbers of refugees and migrants cross the Channel in small boats.
mt: 抗议活动发生在日益增加的紧张局势中,
ref: 随着越来越多的难民和移民乘坐小船穿越英吉利海峡，紧张局势加剧，抗议活动随之发生。
paraphrase_llama3: A peaceful demonstration occurred amidst escalating concerns as an increasing number of asylum seekers and migrants were attempting to reach the UK by crossing the English Channel in makeshift vessel

src: More than 45,000 people reached the UK by that route in 2022, and most applied for asylum.
mt: 超过45,000人通过这条路线在2022年抵达英国,其中大多数人申请庇护.
ref: 2022 年，超过 4.5 万人通过这条路线抵达英国，大多数人申请了庇护。
paraphrase_llama3: In 2022, over 45,000 individuals arrived in the UK through a specific route, with the majority seeking refuge.

src: The system for considering asylum applications has slowed to a crawl because of political turmoil and bureaucratic delays, leaving many asylum seekers stuck in hotels or other temporary accommodations.
mt: 由于政治动荡和官僚拖延, 审查庇护申请的系统已经慢了下来,
ref: 由于政治动荡和官僚主义的拖延，庇护申请系统非常缓慢，令许多寻求庇护者被迫困在酒店或其他临时住所。
paraphrase_llama3: Due to political unrest and administrative inefficiencies, the processing of asylum requests has come to a near standstill, resulting in numerous asylum seekers being forced to reside in temporary accommodations.

src: The Channel crossings have become a political issue, with the Conservative government promising to "stop the boats" and pursuing a plan to send such asylum seekers to Rwanda.
mt: 保守党政府承诺"阻止这些船只", 并计划将这些寻求庇护者送往卢旺达.
ref: 横渡英吉利海峡已经成为一个政治问题，保守党政府承诺会“阻止船只”，并推行一项计划，将这些寻求庇护者送往卢旺达。
paraphrase_llama3: The issue of migrants crossing the English Channel has become a contentious political topic, with the current government vowing to curb the influx and exploring a controversial plan to deport asylum seekers to a foreign countr

src: Opponents have accused the government of demonising desperate people fleeing war and poverty.
mt: 反对者指责政府对逃离战争和贫困的绝望民众进行妖魔化.
ref: 反对者指责政府将逃离战争和贫困且绝望的人们妖魔化。
paraphrase_llama3: Critics have accused the government of unfairly portraying refugees as villains, rather than acknowledging their desperate circumstances.

src: President's Cup: Candystripes defeat Rovers in season opener at Brandywell
mt: 总统杯: 糖条纹击败罗弗斯在布兰迪韦尔的赛季开幕

mt: 德里中场亚当·莱利在布兰迪威尔的李格雷斯的关闭
ref: 在 Brandywell，德里城队中场 Adam Reilly 拦住了 Lee Grace
paraphrase_llama3: Adam Reilly, Derry's midfielder, aggressively tackles Lee Grace at the Brandywell stadiu

mt: 德里城在总统杯中取得胜利,因为他们以2比0战胜了夏姆洛克罗弗斯.

paraphrase_llama3: Derry City won the President's Cup title by defeating Shamrock Rovers 2-0.

mt: 足总杯冠军在布兰迪威尔击败了上赛季的联赛冠军,

src: The Hoops pushed to reduced terms in the second half but Ruaidhri Higgins' charges stood firm to win the curtain-raiser.
mt: 霍普斯在下半场推进了减速, 但罗伊德里希金斯的指控坚定地赢得了上场.
ref: 下半场比赛中，The Hoops 要求减少条款，但 Ruaidhri Higgins 的指控立场坚定，赢得了揭幕战。

src: Derry travel to St. Patrick's Athletic for the league opener next Friday.
mt: 德里队将于下周五前往圣帕特里克竞技队参加联赛首赛.

src: Patching's side-footed volley nudged Derry in front after 23 minutes - the midfielder opened the scoring as the Foylesider's ran out 2-1 winners over the eventual champions last February.

paraphrase_llama3: Midfielder Patching scored the opening goal for Derry with a precise side-footed volley, giving them a 1-0 lead after 23 minutes, and they went on to win 2-1 against the eventual champions in a match last Februar

mt: 霍普斯队以13分的优势赢得了英超联赛冠军,但达菲很快就让曼城队以远程的努力取得了领先,这场比赛成功地在守门员莱昂·波尔斯的带领下入了球网.

src: Graham Burke went closest to reducing the arrears in the second period but the Candystripes were comfortable winners a week prior to their quest for national glory.
mt: 格雷厄姆·伯克在第二节最接近减少欠款, 但"条纹"队在一周前的比赛中取得了舒适的胜利.

src: City boss Ruaidhri Higgins praised his team after what he said was the "hardest week of my life" following the death of his brother Kevin.
mt: 城市老板Ruaidhri希金斯称赞他的团队后, 他说是"我生命中最艰难的一周"
ref: 德里城队老板 Ruaidhri Higgins 称赞了他的球队，他说这是继他哥哥 Kevin 去世后“我一生中最艰难的一周”。

src: DHS hires law firm to handle possible Alejandro Mayorkas impeachment proceedings
mt: 国土安全部聘请律师事务所处理可能的阿莱哈德罗·梅奥卡弹程序

paraphrase_llama3: The Department of Homeland Security has engaged a law firm to manage any potential impeachment proceedings against Alejandro Mayorka

src: The Department of Homeland Security has hired an outside law firm - Debevoise & Plimpton - to assist in possible impeachment proceedings for Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas, as he potentially faces charges by House Republicans regarding his handling of the southern border.
mt: 美国国土安全部已经聘请了一家外部律师事务所 - - 德贝沃兹与普林普顿 - - 协助可能的弹程序,
ref: 国土安全部已经聘请了一家外部律师事务所 Debevoise & Plimpton 协助 Alejandro Mayorkas 可能面临的弹劾程序，因为他可能面临众议院共和党人指控他处理南部边境的问题。
paraphrase_llama3: The US Department of Homeland Security has brought in an external law firm, Debevoise & Plimpton, to help with potential impeachment proceedings against Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas, who could be charged by House Republicans for his management of the southern border.

src: "The Department of Homeland Security has retained outside counsel to help ensure the Department's vital mission is not interrupted by the unprecedented, unjustified, and partisan impeachment efforts by some Members of Congress, who have already taken steps to initiate proceedings," a DHS spokesperson said in a statement Friday.
mt: "国土安全部已聘请外部顾问, 确保部的重要任务不会被一些国会议员所做的前所未有的, 毫无理由的, 党派的弹努力所打扰",
ref: DHS 发言人周五在一份声明中说：“国土安全部聘请了外部律师，以帮助确保该部的重要使命不会因一些国会议员前所未有的、不合理的和党派性的弹劾而中断，这些议员已经采取措施启动诉讼程序，”
paraphrase_llama3: "The Department of Homeland Security has hired outside lawyers to ensure its work is not disrupted by the impeachment process, which some lawmakers are pushing forward with without a valid reason, and which could negatively impact the Department's important tasks."

src: "DHS will continue prioritizing its work to protect our country from terrorism, respond to natural disasters, and secure our borders while responding appropriately to the over 70 Congressional committees and subcommittees that have oversight of DHS."
mt: "国土安全部将继续优先保护我们的国家免受恐怖主义,应对自然灾害,并保护我们的边界,
ref: “DHS 将继续优先考虑保护我们的国家免受恐怖主义袭击、应对自然灾害和保护我们的边境，同时对监督 DHS 的 70 多个国会委员会和小组委员会做出适当回应。”
paraphrase_llama3: "DHS will focus on safeguarding the nation from terrorism, coping with natural disasters, and securing the borders while cooperating with Congressional committees and subcommittees that oversee its activities."

src: A DHS official tells CBS News the department has hired the firm for contracted work for the life of the congressional inquiry.

paraphrase_llama3: The Department of Homeland Security has engaged a private firm to assist with tasks related to the ongoing congressional investigation.

src: Debevoise was chosen because of its expertise in impeachment and bipartisan experience in working with Congress on oversight.
