src: Kilcher broke out with Terrence Malick's 2002 movie "The New World," where she portrayed Pocahontas.
mt: 基尔切尔在2002年演出了特伦斯·马利克的电影"新世界",她饰演了波卡洪塔斯.
ref: 基尔彻凭借泰伦斯·马力克 2002 年的电影《新世界》一举成名，在该片中她扮演了波卡洪塔斯。
paraphrase_llama3: Kilcher made her film debut in 2002 with Terrence Malick's "The New World," playing the role of Pocahontas.

src: Her credits also include "Sons of Anarchy," "The Alienist" and "Dora and the Lost City of Gold."
mt: 她的作品还包括"无政府之子"",异种主义者"和"多拉和失落的黄金城".
ref: 她的作品还包括《混乱之子》、《沉默的天使》和《爱探险的朵拉：消失的黄金城》
paraphrase_llama3: In addition to her notable roles in "Sons of Anarchy" and "The Alienist," she has also appeared in the adventure film "Dora and the Lost City of Gold."

src: She most recently appeared in the road-trip film "Dog," starring Channing Tatum.
mt: 她最近出现在路上旅行电影"狗",主演陈宁塔图姆.
ref: 她最近出演了由查宁·塔图姆主演的公路旅行电影《狗》。
paraphrase_llama3: The actress has recently been seen in the movie "Dog," a road-trip film featuring Channing Tatum.

src: Times staff writer Christina Martinez contributed to this report.
mt: 报道称,
ref: 《纽约时报》特约撰稿人 Christina Martinez 对此文的编撰付出了努力。
paraphrase_llama3: Christina Martinez, a staff writer for Times, helped compile this report.

src: Balenciaga boss calls holiday campaign 'stupid mistake'
mt: 贝伦西亚加的老板称假日活动是"愚蠢的错误"
ref: 巴黎世家老板称假日活动为“愚蠢的错误”
paraphrase_llama3: The head of Balenciaga has criticized the brand's recent holiday campaign, calling it a regrettable error.

src: Luxury clothing brand Balenciaga is still reeling from the backlash over two of its recent ad campaigns.
mt: 奢服装品牌巴伦西亚加最近两次广告活动的反响仍在震撼.
ref: 奢侈服装品牌巴黎世家最近的两次广告活动仍受到强烈反对。
paraphrase_llama3: Balenciaga, a high-end fashion brand, is still dealing with the negative fallout from its latest advertising effort

src: Months after the fashion house came under heat for promotional images that critics said sexualized children, Balenciaga artistic director Demna (full name Demna Gvasalia) said he's still sorry for the images in an interview with Vogue published Friday.
mt: 评论家称这些宣传图片对儿童有性感的印象, 之后几个月,
ref: 几个月前，巴黎世家的宣传图片遭到批评，称这些图片将儿童色情化。几个月后，巴黎世家的艺术总监 Demna（全名 Demna Gvasalia）在周五接受《Vogue》采访时表示，他再次对这些图片表示抱歉。
paraphrase_llama3: The artistic director of Balenciaga, Demna Gvasalia, has expressed regret for the promotional images that sparked controversy over their perceived sexualization of children, in an interview with Vogu

src: "I want to personally apologize for the wrong artistic choice of concept for the gifting campaign with the kids and I take my responsibility," he told Vogue, echoing a previous statement he posted to social media in December.
mt: "我个人为与孩子们一起进行礼物活动的错误艺术选择道歉, 我承担了责任", 他告诉"Vogue",
ref: 他告诉《Vogue》，“我想亲自为孩子们礼物活动的错误艺术选择概念道歉，我为此承担责任，”这一点呼应了他去年 12 月在社交媒体上发布的声明。
paraphrase_llama3: "He expressed regret for the artistic decision made for the gift campaign, acknowledging his role in the mistake."

src: In November, the brand shared photos for its "The Gift" collection, which featured child models posing with teddy bears that were dressed in bondage attire.
mt: 品牌在11月份分享了"礼物"系列的照片,
ref: 11 月，该品牌分享了其“礼物”系列的照片，其中包括穿着束缚服装的儿童模特与泰迪熊合影。
paraphrase_llama3: The brand launched its "The Gift" collection in November, showcasing adorable child models cuddling with teddy bears adorned in unusual outfit

src: Shortly after, Balenciaga dropped photos for its spring 2023 campaign that featured a page from a 2008 Supreme Court case involving "virtual child pornography" in the background.
mt: 很快之后,巴伦西亚加发布了2023年春季竞选活动的照片,
ref: 不久之后，巴黎世家放弃了其 2023 年春季活动的照片，这些照片以 2008 年最高法院涉及“虚拟儿童色情”的案件为背景。
paraphrase_llama3: The fashion brand Balenciaga released its spring 2023 campaign, which included a surprising element - a page from a 2008 Supreme Court case on virtual child pornography in the background.

src: Parents, including reality TV star and longtime Balenciaga fan - and brand partner - Kim Kardashian, spoke out against the brand and its "disturbing images" on social media.
mt: 他们的家长,包括现实电视明星,长期的Balenciaga粉丝和品牌合作伙伴Kim Kardashian, 在社交媒体上反对该品牌及其"令人不安的图像".
ref: 所有父母，包括真人秀明星和巴黎世家的长期粉丝兼品牌合作伙伴 Kim Kardashian，在社交媒体上公开反对该品牌及其“令人不安的图像”。
paraphrase_llama3: Influential parents, including celebrity Kim Kardashian, have expressed outrage on social media over the brand's controversial and disturbing advertising images.

src: Days later, Balenciaga released a statement apologizing for the photos and outlining the changes it would implement to avoid similar "mistakes" in the future.
mt: 几天后, 巴伦西亚加发布了一份声明,
ref: 几天后，巴黎世家发布了一份声明，为这些照片道歉，并表示将进行整改，以避免未来出现类似“错误”。
paraphrase_llama3: Following the controversy, Balenciaga issued a public apology and announced measures to prevent future missteps.

src: "This experience has forced me to reevaluate a lot of things in the way I, we, work, in the way we create and communicate images, the way we interact with our audiences, and the way we learn from our mistakes and move forward," Demna told Vogue.
mt: "这次经历迫使我重新评估了我,我们的工作方式,我们创建和传达图像的方式,我们与观众互动的方式,以及我们从错误中学习并向前迈进的方式", Demna告诉Vogue.
ref: 德姆纳告诉《Vogue》：“这次经历迫使我重新评估我的工作方式，我们创造和交流图像的方式，我们与观众互动的方式，以及我们从错误中吸取教训并前进的方式。”
paraphrase_llama3: "This experience has made me reassess many aspects of my work, including the way I collaborate, the creative process, and how I engage with my audience, as well as how I approach failure and growth

src: He detailed the postbacklash changes at Balenciaga: "restructuring the image department," conducting more internal and external checks for campaign imagery, and partnering with the National Children's Alliance to help "thousands of kids in the process of overcoming trauma and dealing with their mental health."
mt: 他详细介绍了巴伦西亚加公司的反击后的变化:"重新组织形象部门", 进行更多的内部和外部检查,
ref: 他详细介绍了巴黎世家遭到强烈抵制后的整改：“重组形象部”，对竞选形象进行更多的内部和外部检查，并与全国儿童联盟合作，帮助“成千上万的孩子克服创伤，对其心理健康问题进行处理。”
paraphrase_llama3: The speaker discussed the changes implemented by Balenciaga after the backlash, which included reorganizing the image department, conducting more thorough checks on campaign visuals, and collaborating with the National Children's Alliance to support thousands of children in their recovery from trauma and mental health issues.

src: "It's the one thing that makes me happy about this whole horrible situation: to do something good out of it," he said of that partnership, which was announced Wednesday.
mt: "这让我对整个可怕的情况感到高兴的一件事就是:从中做出一些好事",
ref: 他谈到周三宣布的合作关系时说：“这是让我对整个糟糕的情况感到高兴的一件事：从中做点好事。”
paraphrase_llama3: "The only positive aspect of this difficult situation is the opportunity to do something positive and meaningful through this partnership," he state

src: Also teaming up with the NCA is Balenciaga's parent company, Kering, which oversees other luxury brands including Saint Laurent and Bottega Veneta.
mt: 另外还与NCA合作的是巴伦西亚加的母公司凯灵,
ref: 与 NCA 合作的还有巴黎世家的母公司开云集团，该集团负责监管包括 Saint Laurent 和 Bottega Veneta 在内的其他奢侈品牌。
paraphrase_llama3: Kering, the parent company of Balenciaga, has partnered with the NCA, joining forces with other luxury brands under its umbrella, such as Saint Laurent and Bottega Venet

src: Under the Kering umbrella is Gucci, which faced backlash in December for a campaign featuring Harry Styles that some social media critics alleged also sexualized children.
mt: 格ucci在凯林的下, 曾在12月面临强烈的反响,
ref: 在开云旗下的是古驰，它在 12 月份因一项以 Harry Styles 为主角的活动而面临强烈抵制，一些社交媒体批评者声称该活动也将儿童性别化。
paraphrase_llama3: Gucci, a luxury brand under the Kering umbrella, recently faced criticism for a campaign featuring Harry Styles that some people felt was inappropriate and potentially sexualized childre

src: In the interview, Denma said he plans to move away from the brand's "provocative" ways.
mt: 丹马表示他打算放弃品牌的"挑"方式.
ref: 在采访中，Denma 表示，他计划远离该品牌的“挑衅”方式。
paraphrase_llama3: Denma intends to distance himself from the brand's more controversial and attention-grabbing approach.

src: "This is part of my learning: I will have a more mature and serious approach to everything I release as an idea or an image," he said.
mt: "这是我学习的一部分:我会对任何我作为一个想法或图像发布的东西采取更成熟和更严的方法",他说.
ref: 他表示，“这是我学习的一部分：我会以一种更成熟、更严肃的态度对待我发布的任何想法或图片。”
paraphrase_llama3: "My goal is to grow and improve in my creative work by adopting a more mature and professional attitude in presenting my ideas and images."

src: "I have decided to go back to my roots in fashion as well as to the roots of Balenciaga, which is making quality clothes - not making image or buzz."
mt: 我决定回到我在时尚界的根源以及巴伦西亚加的根源,
ref: “我已经决定回到我的时尚根源，以及巴黎世家的根源，这是制作高品质的衣服，而不是制作图像或噪音。”
paraphrase_llama3: "I have chosen to return to my fashion roots and to the essence of Balenciaga, focusing on crafting high-quality garments rather than creating a trendy image or generating hype."

src: Speaking of the brand's origins, elsewhere in the interview Demna said one of the most "painful" parts of the backlash was tarnishing "the name of Balenciaga and the legacy of Cristóbal Balenciaga."
mt: 谈到品牌的起源, 在采访中德姆纳说, 对于反击最"痛苦"的部分之一是玷污"巴伦西亚加的名字和克里斯托巴尔·巴伦西亚加的遗产".
ref: 在谈到品牌的起源时，Demna 在采访的其他地方表示，抵制中最“痛苦”的一部分是玷污“巴黎世家的名字和 Cristóbal Balenciaga 的遗产”
paraphrase_llama3: Demna expressed regret over the damage caused to Balenciaga's reputation and the legacy of its founder, Cristóbal Balenciaga, due to the negative backlash.

src: "Balenciaga is a house that is over one century old and is based on strong and beautiful creative values, and I have been busy doing all in my creative power to bring it to its modern relevance, and suddenly we were under attack and labeled as something we're not at all," Demna said.
mt: "巴伦西亚加是一家百年多的品牌, 建立在强大而美丽的创意价值观之上, 我一直忙于尽我创造力,
ref: Demna 表示，“巴黎世家是一个超过一个世纪历史的房子，它以重大创意价值和美好创意理念为根基，我一直在努力竭尽我的创造力使它与现代接轨，突然我们面临强烈抵制，被贴上了我们根本不存在的标签。”
paraphrase_llama3: "Balenciaga is a century-old fashion house with a rich history and strong creative principles. I've dedicated myself to revitalizing its modern appeal, but we've faced unexpected criticism for being something we're not."

src: "We certainly made a huge and stupid mistake with the gifting campaign, and we certainly have learned from it."
mt: 我们肯定犯了巨大的愚蠢错误,
ref: “我们肯定在送礼活动中犯了一个巨大而愚蠢的错误，我们确实已经从中吸取了教训。”
paraphrase_llama3: "We regretfully committed a significant error in our gifting initiative and have since gained valuable insights from the experience."

src: It's Fake News, CBN Debunks Claim It Lacks Capacity To Print More New Naira Notes
mt: 央行证实没有能力印制更多新奈拉票
ref: 这是假新闻，CBN 驳斥称其没有能力印刷更多新的奈拉纸币
paraphrase_llama3: CBN has refuted claims that it is unable to print more new naira notes.

src: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) has described as misleading, the report that claimed to be quoting CBN govemor, Mr. Godwin Emefiele, as attributing the current challenge in the distribution of the newly redesigned Naira banknotes to a shortage of printing materials at the Nigerian Security Printing and Minting Company Plc.
mt: 尼日利亚中央银行 (CBN) 称该报告误导, 声称引用CBN总裁Godwin Emefiele先生的话, 称目前在新改版奈拉纸币的发行方面存在的挑战是由于尼日利亚安全印刷和造币公司有限公司的印刷材料短缺.
ref: 该报道声称引用尼日利亚中央银行行长 Godwin Emefiele 先生的话，将目前分发新设计的奈拉纸币的困难归咎于尼日利亚安全印刷和造币公司印刷材料短缺，尼日利亚中央银行称该报道具有误导性。
paraphrase_llama3: The Central Bank of Nigeria has denied a report that attributed the difficulties in distributing the new Naira banknotes to a shortage of printing materials at the Nigerian Security Printing and Minting Compan

src: In a statement issued on Saturday, CBN spokesman, Osita Nwasinobi, said at no time did the CBN governor made such statement during his presentation to the National Council of State at its meeting on Friday, February 10, 2023.
mt: 央行发言人奥西塔·努瓦西诺比在周六发表的一份声明中表示,央行行长在2023年2月10日星期五的国务院会议上没有在任何时候发表过这样的声明.
ref: 在周六发表的一份声明中，CBN 发言人 Osita Nwasinobi 表示，CBN 州长在 2023 年 2 月 10 日星期五向国家国务委员会提交报告时从未发表过此类声明。
paraphrase_llama3: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) has denied that its governor made a certain statement during a meeting with the National Council of State on February 10, 2023.

src: Mr Nwasinobi said Emefiele only told the meeting that the NSPMC was working on printing all denominations of the Naira to meet the transaction needs of Nigerians.
mt: 尼瓦西诺比先生说,埃米菲尔在会议上只说,国家人民币委员会正在努力打印尼拉的所有面额,以满足尼日利亚人的交易需求.
ref: Nwasinobi 先生说，Emefiele 只是告诉会议说，尼日利亚国家货币发行委员会正在印刷所有面值的奈拉，以满足尼日利亚人的交易需求。
paraphrase_llama3: Mr Nwasinobi revealed that Emefiele informed the meeting that the NSPMC was working on producing all denominations of the Naira to cater to the transaction requirements of Nigerians.

src: He said while the CBN appreciates the concerns shown by all stakeholders about the distribution of the new Naira notes, "we are alarmed at the extent to which vested interests are attempting to manipulate facts and pitch the public against the Bank."
mt: 他表示,虽然央行赞赏所有利益相关者对新币发行表达的担忧,但"我们对既得利益企图操纵事实并使公众反对银行的程度感到震惊".
ref: 他说，虽然中央银行理解所有利益相关者对新奈拉纸币发行的担忧，但“我们对既得利益者试图操纵事实和让公众反对银行的程度感到震惊。”
paraphrase_llama3: The Central Bank of Nigeria acknowledges the worries expressed by all parties regarding the distribution of the new Naira notes, but is troubled by the efforts of special interest groups to distort the truth and create division between the Bank and the public.

src: Nwasinobi said the CBN remains committed to performing its monetary policy functions, as stipulated in the CBN Act, 2007 (as amended).
mt: 西诺比表示, 央行仍然致力于履行其货币政策职能,
ref: Nwasinobi 表示，CBN 仍然致力于履行其货币政策职能，正如 2007 年 CBN 法案（经修订）所规定的那样。
paraphrase_llama3: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) remains dedicated to carrying out its monetary policy duties as outlined in the CBN Act of 2007, which has undergone some revisions.

src: "We also wish to restate that the NSPMC has the capacity and enough materials to produce the required indent of the Naira.
mt: 我们还希望重申NSPMC有能力和足够的材料来生产奈拉所需的缩减.
ref: “我们还希望重申，NSPMC 有能力和足够的材料来生产奈拉所需的订单。
paraphrase_llama3: "Additionally, we want to emphasize that the NSPMC has the resources and necessary materials to meet the demand for the Naira currency."

src: "The bank, therefore, wishes to appeal to the public to disregard the said report and exercise more restraint, even as we work assiduously to increase the circulation of the new notes in the country," he added.
mt: 银行希望呼吁公众无视上述报告, 保持克制,
ref: 他补充道，“因此，银行希望呼吁公众不要理会上述报告，即使我们正在努力在该国的流通中增加新钞票，更应该保持克制。”
paraphrase_llama3: "The bank is urging the public to ignore the report and be patient while we work hard to get the new notes into circulation."

src: On a particular voice note trending on the social media alleging that the CBN planned to shut down some banks, particularly in a particular geopolitical region of the country, the CBN said there was no such plan and that the claims were illogical and do not comply with the workings of the Nigerian banking system.
mt: 关于社交媒体上流行的声称CBN计划关闭一些银行, 特别是该国特定的地缘政治地区的声称, CBN表示没有这样的计划, 并且这些说法是不合逻辑的, 并不符合尼日利亚银行系统的运作.
ref: 在社交媒体上流行的一条特定语音消息称，尼日利亚中央银行计划关闭一些银行，特别是在该国的一个特定地缘政治地区，该银行表示，没有这样的计划，这些说法是不合逻辑的，不符合尼日利亚银行系统的运作。
paraphrase_llama3: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) has dismissed a viral social media message claiming that it plans to shut down some banks in a specific region of the country. The CBN stated that such a plan is not feasible and does not align with the Nigerian banking syste

src: "The public is therefore advised to ignore such recordings as they do not represent the policy thrust of the CBN and are only the desperate attempts of persons bent on inciting the public against the Bank," he stated.
mt: 他表示:"因此建议公众忽略这些录音, 因为它们不代表央行政策,
ref: 他表示，“因此，建议公众忽略这些录音，因为它们并不代表中央银行的政策主旨，只是那些一心煽动公众反对中央银行的人的绝望企图。”
paraphrase_llama3: "The public is urged to disregard any recordings that are not official statements of the CBN, as they are just attempts by individuals to mislead the public against the Bank."

src: Tim Sherwood tears into £44m signing Pedro Porro after dismal Tottenham debut
mt: 蒂姆谢伍德在托特纳姆的首秀之后, 签下了4400万英的佩德罗波罗.
ref: 托特纳姆首秀惨淡后，蒂姆·舍伍德以 4400 万英镑签下佩德罗·波罗
paraphrase_llama3: Tim Sherwood has heavily criticized Pedro Porro, the £44m signing, for his poor performance in his debut match for Tottenham.

src: Porro had an afternoon to forget against Leicester (Picture: Getty)
mt: 波罗在对阵莱斯特的比赛中经历了一段难以忘怀的下午 (图片来源:盖蒂)
ref: 波罗度过了一个难忘的下午，对阵莱切斯特城（图片：Getty）
paraphrase_llama3: Porro's match against Leicester was a disappointing and forgettable experience.

src: Tim Sherwood tore into Pedro Porro's "absolutely disgusting" defending during Tottenham's 4-1 defeat to Leicester City.
mt: 蒂姆·谢尔伍德在托特纳姆4:1击败莱斯特城的比赛中, 击了佩德罗·波罗的"绝对令人厌恶"的防守.
ref: 在热刺 1-4 输给莱切斯特城的比赛中，蒂姆·舍伍德抨击了佩德罗·波罗“绝对恶心”的防守。
paraphrase_llama3: Tim Sherwood heavily criticized Pedro Porro's poor defending, describing it as "absolutely disgusting" after Tottenham's loss to Leicester City.

src: Spurs signed the right-back from Sporting CP on transfer deadline day on an initial loan deal for £5million with the obligation to buy this summer for £39million.
mt: 马刺在转会截止日签下了来自体育俱乐部的右后卫, 首次贷款合同为500万英, 义务在今年夏天以3900万英购买.
ref: 热刺在转会截止日以 500 万英镑的初始租借合同从 Sporting CP 签下了这名右后卫，并有义务在今年夏天以 3900 万英镑的价格购买。
paraphrase_llama3: The right-back from Sporting CP joined Spurs on transfer deadline day on a temporary basis for £5 million, with the option to make the deal permanent for £39 million in the summe

src: The 23-year-old was handed his debut by Antonio Conte on Saturday at the King Power Stadium with his side taking the lead after 14 minutes through Rodrigo Bentancur.
mt: 这位23岁的球员在周六在国王力量体育场的首次亮相,他的球队在14分钟后通过罗德里戈·本坦库尔领先.
ref: 这位 23 岁的球员在周六的国王电力球场首次亮相，他的球队在第 14 分钟由罗德里戈·本坦库尔取得领先。
paraphrase_llama3: Antonio Conte gave a young player his first professional match on Saturday at the King Power Stadium, where his team took the lead early on with a goal from Rodrigo Bentancur.

src: But it turned into an miserable afternoon with Nampalys Mendy, James Maddison and Kelechi Iheanacho all scoring to give Leicester a 3-1 at half-time with Porro enduring a torrid first-half in the Premier League.
mt: 莱斯特在半场休息时以3-1获胜, 波罗在英超上半场经历了激烈的比赛.
ref: 但这变成了一个悲惨的下午，纳姆帕利斯·门迪，詹姆斯·马迪森和克莱奇·伊希纳乔都进球了，让莱切斯特在半场时以 3-1 领先，而波罗在英超联赛中忍受了炎热的上半场。
paraphrase_llama3: The afternoon took a turn for the worse as Mendy, Maddison, and Iheanacho found the net, giving Leicester a commanding 3-1 lead at halftime, while Porro struggled through a difficult first half in the Premier League.

src: The Spaniard was at fault again as Leicester thought they had added a fourth through Barnes and while the goal was ruled out for offside, former Spurs manager Sherwood was left shocked by the full-back's defensive efforts.
mt: 莱斯特认为他们通过巴恩斯增加了第四个进球,而这场进球被排除在外场,前马刺经理谢伍德因后卫的防守努力而感到震惊.
ref: 西班牙人再次犯错，莱斯特认为他们通过巴恩斯增加了第四个进球，虽然这个进球被判越位，但前马刺队主教练舍伍德对这位后卫的防守努力感到震惊。
paraphrase_llama3: The Spaniard made a mistake, and Leicester thought they had scored a fourth goal. Although the goal was disallowed for offside, former Tottenham manager Sherwood was surprised by the full-back's poor defensive performanc

src: "I don't want to keep picking on the kid but he needs to be relieved of his duties," Sherwood told Soccer Saturday.
mt: "我不想继续挑选孩子, 但他需要解除他的职责", 谢尔伍德告诉足球周六.
ref: 舍伍德在接受《Soccer Saturday》采访时表示：“我不想一直责备这孩子，应该解除他的职务。”
paraphrase_llama3: "Sherwood believes that the kid is not performing well enough and should be replaced."

src: I'll give him the benefit of the doubt because it is his debut but Pedro Porro is no bad it is unbelievable.
mt: 我会给他带来好处的怀疑, 因为这是他的首次, 但佩德罗·波罗不坏,
ref: 我认为，这是他的处子秀，Pedro Porro 表现并不差，才惊四座。
paraphrase_llama3: I'm willing to overlook his mistakes in his first game because Pedro Porro is not a bad player, it's just unbelievabl

src: His positioning is absolutely disgusting, Barnes and Maddison are destroying him down the left hand side.
mt: 他的位置绝对令人厌恶,巴恩斯和麦迪森正在摧毁他的左手.
ref: 他的定位真令人反感，Barnes 和 Maddison 从左手边赶超了他。
paraphrase_llama3: His defensive positioning is abysmal, and Barnes and Maddison are exploiting his weaknesses on the left flank.

src: Daniel Levy was saying this week, they have spent a lot of money, yes they have, but their recruitment has been very poor and this is the latest addition.
mt: 丹尼尔·莱维本周说, 他们花了很多钱,
ref: 丹尼尔·利维本周表示，他们已经花了很多钱，的确如此，他们已经花了很多钱，但是他们的招募工作非常糟糕，这是对最近情况的补充。
paraphrase_llama3: Daniel Levy has been critical of Tottenham's spending this week, pointing out that they've invested heavily, but the results have been underwhelming, with the latest signing being a prime example.

src: Let's not make any conclusions at the moment but what I am looking at is a player who does not want to defend.
mt: 我看到了一个不想防守的球员.
ref: 我们现在不要妄下断语，而我看他是一个不想防守的球员。
paraphrase_llama3: For now, I don't think we should jump to any conclusions, but it seems that the player in question is unwilling to put up a fight.

src: More: Premier League
mt: 更多:英超联赛
ref: 更多：英超联赛
paraphrase_llama3: The top tier of English football

src: "Antonio Conte has complained about the defending and this player, at the moment is struggling to defend. He is up against very good players in Barnes and Maddison but it is very disappointing."
mt: 卡尔德说:"安东尼奥·康特抱怨防守,而这名球员目前正在努力防守. 他面对的是巴恩斯和麦迪森的非常优秀球员,
ref: “安东尼奥·孔蒂对防守颇有微词，这名球员现在正在努力防守。他面对的是 Barnes 和 Maddison 的优秀球员，但这令人非常失望。”
paraphrase_llama3: "Antonio Conte is dissatisfied with the team's defense and feels that one player in particular is struggling to cope with the opposition's attacking threats. The player is facing stiff competition from Barnes and Maddison, and the manager's expectations are not being met."

src: While the goal was ruled out, Leicester restored their 4-1 lead with Barnes on target nine minutes from full-time.
mt: 虽然这场比赛没有进球,但莱斯特队以4比1的比分领先,
ref: 虽然进球被判罚无效，但莱斯特在离全场结束还有 9 分钟时，由 Barnes 瞄准目标，恢复了他们 4-1 的领先优势。
paraphrase_llama3: Leicester's 4-1 lead was almost threatened when the goal was disallowed, but they regained their momentum with Barnes scoring nine minutes before the final whistl

src: Despite beating Manchester City last week, Tottenham missed the chance to move ahead of Newcastle into third place.
mt: 尽管上周击败了曼城, 但托特纳姆错过了领先纽卡斯尔的机会,
ref: 尽管上周击败了曼城，但热刺错过了超越纽卡斯尔进入第三名的机会。
paraphrase_llama3: Tottenham's victory over Manchester City was overshadowed by their failure to capitalize on the opportunity to overtake Newcastle in the league standings.

src: MORE: Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink tells Chelsea not to sign Joao Felix and swoop for Tottenham star instead
mt: 吉米·弗洛伊德·哈塞尔班克告诉切尔西不要签下乔阿·费利克斯, 而是抢夺托特纳姆球星
ref: 更多：吉米·弗洛伊德·哈塞尔巴因克告诉切尔西不要签下若昂·菲利克斯，转而签下热刺球星
paraphrase_llama3: Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink advises Chelsea against signing Joao Felix and recommends they pursue a different player, Tottenham's star, instead.

src: MORE: Tottenham set to bid for Crystal Palace star Marc Guehi but Chelsea have unofficial buy-back option
mt: 切尔西有非官方的回购选择
ref: 更多：托特纳姆准备出价购买水晶宫球星马克·古希，但是切尔西有非官方的回购选择权
paraphrase_llama3: Tottenham is likely to make a bid for Crystal Palace player Marc Guehi, but Chelsea has a secret clause that allows them to re-purchase hi

src: For more stories like this, check our sport page.
mt: 更多类似的故事,
ref: 更多类似的故事，请查看我们的体育版。
paraphrase_llama3: For further updates on sports, visit our sports section.

src: Follow Metro Sport for the latest news on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.
mt: 在Facebook,Twitter和Instagram上关注最新消息.
ref: 关注 Metro Sport，了解脸书、Twitter 和 Instagram 上的最新消息。
paraphrase_llama3: Get the latest updates on Metro Sport on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

src: Jack Smith should win any privilege fight over Mike Pence subpoena
mt: 杰克史密斯应该赢得任何特权争夺迈克·斯传票
ref: 杰克·史密斯应该赢得任何关于迈克·彭斯传票的特权斗争
paraphrase_llama3: Jack Smith has a strong chance of winning a privilege fight against Mike Pence's subpoen

src: The news that special counsel Jack Smith has subpoenaed Mike Pence raises the question: How will Team Trump use the courts to muck up this latest development in the Justice Department's probe?
mt: 特别检察官杰克史密斯传唤了斯, 引发了一个问题:特朗普团队将如何利用法庭来破坏司法部调查的最新进展?
ref: 特别顾问杰克·史密斯传唤迈克·彭斯的消息引发了一个问题：特朗普团队将如何利用法院来搞乱司法部调查的最新进展？
paraphrase_llama3: The revelation that special counsel Jack Smith has issued a subpoena to Mike Pence sparks concerns about how the Trump team will respond, potentially using legal avenues to hinder the investigation's progress.

src: The short answer is that any attempt to scuttle the Pence subpoena on executive privilege grounds should fail.
mt: 简而言之, 任何试图以行政特权为由,
ref: 简单而言，任何以行政特权为由阻挠彭斯传票的企图都应该失败。
paraphrase_llama3: Any effort to evade the Pence subpoena by citing executive privilege is likely to be unsuccessful.

src: First off, there's a threshold question of whether a former president can even claim the privilege.
mt: 首先,有一个门问题,
ref: 首先，有一个门槛问题，前总统是否可以要求这种特权。
paraphrase_llama3: Before we proceed, we need to determine if a former president can invoke executive privilege at all.

src: Recall that Trump tried and failed to block the House Jan. 6 committee from getting White House records.
mt: 记住特朗普试图阻止众议院1月6日委员会获取白宫记录,
ref: 回想一下，特朗普试图阻止众议院 1 月 6 日委员会获得白宫记录，但失败了。
paraphrase_llama3: Despite his efforts, Trump was unsuccessful in preventing the House Jan. 6 committee from obtaining White House documents.

src: The Supreme Court declined to take up Trump's appeal last year, with only Justice Clarence Thomas (husband of 2020 election denier Ginni Thomas) dissenting.
mt: 美国最高法院去年拒绝接受特朗普的上诉,只有法官克拉伦斯·托马斯 (2020年选举否认者吉尼·托马斯的丈夫) 不赞同.
ref: 最高法院去年拒绝受理特朗普的上诉，只有大法官克拉伦斯·托马斯（2020 年选举否认者吉尼·托马斯的丈夫）持异议。
paraphrase_llama3: The Supreme Court did not accept Trump's appeal in 2020, except for Justice Clarence Thomas, who disagreed with the decision.

src: But the court left open the question of whether an ex-president can claim privilege, with Justice Brett Kavanaugh suggesting he'd support such a claim.
mt: 但法院没有明确前总统是否可以要求特权,
ref: 但法院对前总统是否可以主张特权的问题没有做出决定，大法官布雷特·卡瓦诺表示他会支持这样的主张。
paraphrase_llama3: The court's decision did not address whether an ex-president can claim executive privilege, with Justice Kavanaugh hinting that he might be open to supporting such a claim.

src: So it's at least unclear whether a former president can claim the privilege, saying nothing of whether the claim would succeed.
mt: 无论如何, 无论如何, 无论如何,
ref: 因此，至少不清楚一位前总统是否可以要求这种特权，更不用说这种要求是否会成功。
paraphrase_llama3: The question remains unclear whether a former president can invoke the privilege, let alone the likelihood of the claim being successful.

src: Plus, the Supreme Court appeal over then-President Richard Nixon's attempt to avoid subpoena compliance shows that a vague privilege assertion won't do, and can be overcome by a specific need for evidence.
mt: 美国最高法院对当时的总统尼克松避免遵守传票的诉讼表明, 模糊的特权声明是不够的,
ref: 此外，最高法院对时任总统理查德·尼克松试图避免遵守传票的上诉表明，模糊的特权主张是不行的，可以通过具体的证据需求来克服。
paraphrase_llama3: The Supreme Court's ruling on Richard Nixon's attempt to avoid complying with a subpoena also demonstrates that a general claim of privilege is insufficient, and can be overcome by a clear need for evidence.

src: The court observed in 1974"s United States v. Nixon:
mt: 美国与尼克松案的判决中指出:
ref: 法院在 1974 年的美国诉尼克松案中指出：
paraphrase_llama3: The court made a significant ruling in 1974's United States v. Nixon case.

src: ... when the ground for asserting privilege as to subpoenaed materials sought for use in a criminal trial is based only on the generalized interest in confidentiality, it cannot prevail over the fundamental demands of due process of law in the fair administration of criminal justice.
mt: 对于被传唤的材料, 要求在刑事审判中使用的特权, 仅仅是基于对保密的普遍利益,
ref: ...当主张在刑事审判中使用传讯材料的特权的理由仅仅是基于保密的普遍利益时，它不能凌驾于公平刑事司法中正当法律程序的基本要求之上。
paraphrase_llama3: In a criminal trial, if the reason for claiming privilege over subpoenaed materials is only to protect confidentiality, it cannot override the essential requirements of a fair trial and the administration of justic

src: The generalized assertion of privilege must yield to the demonstrated, specific need for evidence in a pending criminal trial.
mt: 普遍的特权要求必须屈服于在正在进行的刑事审判中,
ref: 在未决的刑事审判中，对特权的广义断言必须服从于对证据的明确、具体的需要。
paraphrase_llama3: In a criminal trial, the general claim of privilege must give way to the specific need for evidence to prove guilt or innocence.

src: Therefore, precedent is on the government's side.
mt: 现在, 法律是政府的.
ref: 因此，先例是站在政府一边的。
paraphrase_llama3: Given the existing laws, the government has a strong basis for its decision.

src: Of course, however, delays from litigating even a losing issue can be a victory of sorts for Trump.
mt: 尽管如此, 延迟诉讼甚至是输球的案例,
ref: 然而，当然，对特朗普来说，拖延诉讼甚至是一个失败的问题也可能是一种胜利。
paraphrase_llama3: While Trump may not win the lawsuit, the delay itself can be a strategic gain for him.

src: But further dampening the odds of a successful privilege claim is the previous rejection of Trump's attempt to block Jan. 6 grand jury testimony.
mt: 但特权权益的成功可能性进一步减弱,
ref: 但进一步降低特权主张成功几率的是，特朗普此前拒绝阻止 1 月 6 日大陪审团作证的企图。
paraphrase_llama3: The fact that Trump's earlier effort to stop witnesses from testifying about the January 6 events was already rejected makes it even less likely that he will succeed in his privilege claim.

src: As The Washington Post reported in October, that rejection noted that former Pence aide Marc Short, for example, "probably possessed information important to the Justice Department's criminal investigation of the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the Capitol that was not available from other sources."
mt: 华盛顿邮报10月报道,该拒绝指出前斯助手马克·肖特 (Marc Short) "可能拥有有关2021年1月6日国会大袭击事件司法部刑事调查的重要信息,而这些信息从其他来源无法获得".
ref: 正如《华盛顿邮报》10 月份报道的那样，该拒绝指出，前彭斯助手 Marc Short“可能拥有对司法部 2021 年 1 月 6 日袭击国会大厦的刑事调查至关重要的信息，这些信息无法从其他来源获得。”
paraphrase_llama3: According to The Washington Post, a report from October highlighted that certain individuals, such as former Pence aide Marc Short, likely had information crucial to the Justice Department's investigation into the January 6, 2021, Capitol attack that could not be obtained from other sources.

src: That Pence, too, likely has unique information would help the DOJ in any subpoena fight.
mt: 斯可能也拥有独特的信息,
ref: 彭斯也可能拥有独特的信息，这将有助于司法部在任何传票斗争中发挥作用。
paraphrase_llama3: The Department of Justice may benefit from Pence's exclusive information in any legal battle involving a subpoen

src: And the reason we think Pence has such information is yet another reason that a privilege claim should fail.
mt: 我们认为斯拥有此类信息的原因是另一个原因,
ref: 而我们认为彭斯掌握这种信息的原因是特权要求应该失败的另一个原因。
paraphrase_llama3: The fact that we suspect Pence has this information is another strong argument against the validity of a privilege clai

src: That's because Pence has chosen to write publicly about at least some of his supposed conversations with Trump in connection with Jan. 6.
mt: 斯选择公开写下与特朗普有关1月6日的部分对话.
ref: 这是因为彭斯选择公开写下至少一些他与特朗普在 1 月 6 日的对话。
paraphrase_llama3: Pence has decided to share his recollections of conversations with Trump regarding the January 6th events in publi

src: It's hard to say communications are privileged when you've previously deemed them fit to publicize.
mt: 很难说通讯是特权的,
ref: 当你以前认为通信适合公开时，很难说它们是特权。
paraphrase_llama3: When you've previously considered communications suitable for public release, it's challenging to argue that they should be kept confidential.

src: So while the subpoena might present varying political and personal calculations for Pence - who may vie for the 2024 Republican nomination against Trump, someone who effectively condoned calls for Pence's extrajudicial execution on Jan. 6 - the courts should have an easy time siding with DOJ on privilege.
mt: 虽然传票可能会为斯提出不同的政治和个人计算 - - 他可能会争夺2024年共和党提名,
ref: 因此，尽管传票可能会对彭斯提出不同的政治和个人考量 - 彭斯可能会在 2024 年与特朗普争夺共和党提名，特朗普在 1 月 6 日实际上纵容了对彭斯进行法外处决的呼吁 - 但法院应该很容易在特权问题上站在司法部一边。
paraphrase_llama3: Although a subpoena may raise complex political and personal issues for Pence, who might consider running for the 2024 Republican nomination against Trump, it is likely that the courts will rule in favor of the Department of Justice on the issue of privilege, given Trump's previous condoning of calls for Pence's execution.

src: The Case Against a Biden Run Is Obvious - and Weak
mt: 反对拜登竞选的理由是显而易见的 - - 并且很弱
ref: 反对拜登竞选的理由是显而易见的，也是站不住脚的
paraphrase_llama3: The arguments against Joe Biden running for president are clear, but unconvincing.

src: Why is this important?
mt: 这为什么很重要?
ref: 为什么这很重要？
paraphrase_llama3: What's the significance of this?

src: While Biden and his fellow Democrats can't do much in the way of passing laws with the GOP in control of the House, they can still spend the next two years setting an example.
mt: 虽然拜登和他的民主党同事在共和党控制众议院的情况下无法通过法律,
ref: 虽然拜登和他的民主党同僚在共和党控制众议院的情况下无法在通过法律方面有所作为，但他们仍然可以在未来两年内树立榜样。
paraphrase_llama3: Despite the Republicans' dominance in the House, Biden and his fellow Democrats can use the next two years to demonstrate their values and principles.

src: Collectively, everyone on the team should be seeking out opportunities to play Gallant to the Republicans" weird Goofus impulses.
mt: 团队中的每一个人都应该寻找机会,
ref: 总的来说，团队中的每个人都应该寻找机会向共和党人怪异的愚蠢冲动献殷勤。
paraphrase_llama3: The team should strive to counterbalance the Republicans' impulsive behavior by being more thoughtful and considerate in their actions.

src: But it's also important for Biden to burnish his credibility with the American people - and maybe be a direly needed change agent in our all-too-tatty political culture.
mt: 但拜登也必须在美国人民眼中提升自己的信誉, 也许在我们过于的政治文化中成为一个急需的变革推动者.
ref: 但对拜登来说，提高他在美国人民中的可信度也很重要，也许他是我们过于保守的政治文化中急需的变革推动者。
paraphrase_llama3: It's crucial for Biden to establish trust with the American public and potentially bring about a much-needed transformation in the current political landscape.

src: Washington, a notoriously cynical place, is famous for its common sense-crippling ideas about leadership.
mt: 华盛顿是一个为愤世嫉俗的城市,
ref: 华盛顿是一个出了名的愤世嫉俗的地方，以其关于领导力的常识性思维而闻名。
paraphrase_llama3: Washington D.C. is notorious for its unconventional views on leadership, which often defy logic and reason.

src: Perhaps one of the most notorious is the odd standard that holds that publicly admitting errors is a sign of weakness and that politicians should go to comical lengths to avoid doing so.
mt: 承认错误是软弱的标志, 政客们应该尽一切努力避免这样做.
ref: 也许最臭名昭著的是一个奇怪的标准，认为公开承认错误是软弱的表现，政治家应该尽可能避免这样做。
paraphrase_llama3: It's widely believed that admitting mistakes in public is a sign of vulnerability and that politicians should take extraordinary measures to avoid admitting them.

src: There's another way: In Bailout, Neil Barofsky's memoir of his time in Washington serving as the special inspector general overseeing the Troubled Asset Relief Program, he described the advice he received from Kristine Belisle, the woman he smartly hired to be his communications director.
mt: 另一个办法:在"救助"中, 尼尔·巴罗夫斯基在华盛顿担任监督困难资产救助计划的特别总监时的回忆录, 他描述了从克里斯·贝利斯尔那里得到的建议,
ref: 还有另一种方法：在 Neil Barofsky 的回忆录《紧急财政援助》（Bailout）中，他描述了自己在华盛顿担任监督问题资产救助计划（TARP）的特别监察长期间，从 Kristine Belisle 那里得到的建议，他聘请了这位女士担任他的联络主任，此乃明智之举。
paraphrase_llama3: In his memoir, Bailout, Neil Barofsky recounts the guidance he received from Kristine Belisle, his communications director, who helped him navigate the complexities of the Troubled Asset Relief Program.

src: It was about as anti-Washington as it can get: "We'll admit and even highlight our mistakes."
mt: 美国政府的政策是:
ref: 这是反华盛顿程度最高的了：“我们会承认甚至强调我们的错误。”
paraphrase_llama3: The statement was as far removed from Washington's style as possible, implying that it would acknowledge and emphasize its own errors.

src: As she went on to explain, there's method in a strategy that most people inside the Beltway would deem madness:
mt: 她继续解释说, 策略中有一种方法,
ref: 正如她继续解释的那样，环城高速公路内的大多数人会认为这种策略是疯狂的：
paraphrase_llama3: She went on to reveal that there is a logical plan behind an approach that many people in the capital would consider unconventional.

src: This is the best way to earn the press's trust.
mt: 这是赢得媒体信任的最佳方式.
ref: 这是赢得媒体信任的最好方法。
paraphrase_llama3: To gain the respect of journalists, one must adopt this approach.

src: They'll know we're not spinning like everyone else.
mt: 他们会知道我们不像其他人一样.
ref: 他们会明白我们不像其他人一样迅速变卦。
paraphrase_llama3: Our authenticity will be evident to others.

src: SIGTARP will quickly become the only credible source for information in Washington about TARP.
mt: 美国的特朗普将很快成为华盛顿唯一可信的信息来源.
ref: SIGTARP 将很快成为美国政府关于 TARP 的唯一可靠消息来源。
paraphrase_llama3: SIGTARP will be the go-to authority in Washington for accurate information about TARP.

src: We might be embarrassed at times and disclose things that we could - and others would - easily hide, but we'll shock the press with our honesty.
mt: 我们可能会感到尬, 揭露我们或其他人可以轻易隐的事情,
ref: 我们有时可能会感到尴尬，并透露一些我们可以 - 以及其他人会 - 轻易隐瞒的事情，但我们会用我们的真诚打动媒体。
paraphrase_llama3: While we may reveal some secrets that could be kept under wraps, our openness will catch the media off guard.

src: No one else does this, and before long, we'll have a built in defense when we're attacked.
mt: 很快,我们就会有防御系统,
ref: 其他人不会这样做，不久，当我们受到攻击时，我们将有一个内部防御策略。
paraphrase_llama3: We will have a natural defense mechanism when we are attacked, as no one else is doing this and it will not take long to develop.

src: No matter what they hear, the press will come to us first and believe us, because we'll prove to them that we tell the truth.
mt: 无论他们听到什么, 媒体会先来找我们, 相信我们,
ref: 不管他们听到什么，媒体会先来找我们并相信我们，因为我们会向他们证明我们说的是实话。
paraphrase_llama3: Regardless of what the media reports, we'll be the first to share our side of the story and demonstrate our credibility by showing the truth.

src: This is perhaps the biggest reason for Biden to pursue the course of radical responsibility-taking: Moments inevitably arise in any presidency when having the trust of the public and the institutions that safeguard the civic interest is critical.
mt: 这也许是拜登坚持采取激进责任感的最大原因:在任何总统任期中, 总会出现一些不可避免的时刻,
ref: 这也许是拜登追求激进责任路线的最大原因：任何一位总统都不可避免地会遇到这样的时刻：公众和捍卫公民利益的机构的信任至关重要。
paraphrase_llama3: A crucial factor in Biden's decision to take bold responsibility is the realization that there are moments in every presidency where maintaining public trust and the confidence of institutions is vital.

src: Moreover, there is vital capital to be earned by owning our mistakes, and there's an important distinction that Biden can draw with his political opponents.
mt: 通过承认自己的错误, 获得重要资本,
ref: 此外，承认我们的错误可以获得至关重要的资本，拜登可以与他的政治对手划清界限。
paraphrase_llama3: Furthermore, acknowledging and learning from our errors can bring significant benefits, and it's crucial to highlight this difference between Biden and his political rivals.

src: The president would do well to follow the old adage: Tell the truth - and shame the devil.
mt: 总统应该遵循一个古老的语:说实话,让魔鬼蒙羞.
ref: 总统最好遵循这句古老的格言：说出真相 - 让魔鬼羞愧。
paraphrase_llama3: The president should be honest and transparent in his words, even if it means revealing uncomfortable truths.

mt: 超级杯广告, 我迫不及待地想看

src: Biden DOJ 'Doesn't Want an Armed Citizenry'
mt: 拜登司法部"不希望有武装公民"
ref: 拜登政府司法部“不希望有武装的公民”
paraphrase_llama3: The Biden administration does not support the idea of a population that is well-armed and capable of defending itsel

src: Rep. Andrew Clyde (R-GA) sat down with Breitbart News on Thursday and discussed his plans to block the ATF pistol brace rule and his conviction that the Biden Department of Justice "doesn't want an armed citizenry" in the first place.
mt: 众议员安德鲁·克莱德 (R-GA) 周四与布雷特巴特新闻坐下来讨论他阻止ATF手枪支架规则的计划,以及他对拜登司法部"不希望武装公民"的信念.
ref: 代表安德鲁·克莱德（共和党）周四接受了 Breitbart News 的采访，讨论了他阻止 ATF 手枪支架规则的计划，以及他对拜登司法部首先“不希望有武装的公民”的信念。
paraphrase_llama3: Republican Representative Andrew Clyde from Georgia spoke with Breitbart News on Thursday, sharing his intentions to prevent the implementation of the ATF's pistol brace rule and his strong belief that the Biden administration does not want citizens to be armed.

src: Clyde made clear his opposition to the pistol brace rule.
mt: 克莱德明确表示反对使用手枪支架的规定.
ref: 克莱德明确表示他反对手枪支架规则。
paraphrase_llama3: Clyde strongly expressed his disagreement with the new pistol rule.

src: His reasons for that opposition include both general objections and more specific ones.
mt: 他反对的原因包括一般的反对和更具体的反对.
ref: 他反对的理由包括一般反对意见和更具体的反对意见。
paraphrase_llama3: The reasons for his opposition are a mix of general concerns and more detailed ones.

src: Generally, he expressed his conviction that our Founding Fathers did not set forth a plan of governance that included federal agencies making laws in place of the legislature.
mt: 他表示相信我们的建国之父并没有制定一个政府计划,
ref: 总的来说，他表达了他的信念，我们的开国元勋们没有制定一个包括联邦机构代替立法机构制定法律的治理计划。
paraphrase_llama3: In his opinion, the Founding Fathers did not intend for federal agencies to create laws instead of the elected representatives in Congress.

src: He said, "The Justice Department is there to enforce the law, not to make the law. When you have the executive branch making the law and enforcing the law, then you have have a king, and a kingdom. Our Founders did not call for a king and they did not lay out a kingdom in the Constitution of the United States."
mt: 他说:"司法部是为了执行法律,而不是制定法律. 当你有行政部门制定法律和执行法律时,你就有国王和王国. 我们的创始人没有要求国王,他们没有在美国宪法中设置一个王国. "
ref: 他说，“司法部是来执法的，不是来制定法律的。当行政部门制定法律并执行法律时，就是王国专政的时代了。我们的建国者没有要求实现王国专政，他们也没有在美国宪法中规划一个王国制度。”
paraphrase_llama3: The speaker emphasized that the Justice Department's primary role is to uphold the law, not create it. He warned that when the executive branch has both the power to make and enforce laws, it becomes akin to a monarch, which is antithetical to the principles of the American Constitution.

src: Clyde then moved to specifics regarding the pistol brace rule and expressed his concern that the rule is part of a greater ATF push to acquire broader registration of firearms.
mt: 克莱德随后谈到了关于手枪支架规则的具体情况, 并表示担心该规则是ATF更大规模推动获得更广泛的枪支注册的一部分.
ref: 克莱德接着谈到了有关手枪支架规则的细节，并表达了他对该规则的关注，该规则是 ATF 为获得更广泛的枪支注册所做的更大努力的一部分。
paraphrase_llama3: Clyde shifted the focus to the pistol brace rule, voicing his worry that this regulation is just one aspect of the ATF's broader effort to track and register more

src: He noted, "What the ATF wants is they want to increase the registration database for the National Firearms Act. They want to register people across the country because, as we know, what comes before confiscation is registration. And confiscation, in my opinion, is the ultimate goal, because this Justice Department doesn't want an armed citizenry."
mt: 他指出:"ATF想要的是增加国家枪支法注册数据库. 他们希望在全国范围内注册人员, 因为我们知道, 没收之前的就是注册. 而没收, 在我看来, 是最终目标, 因为司法部不希望有武装的公民. "
ref: 他指出，“烟酒枪支管理局想要的是增加国家枪支法案的注册数据库。他们想在全国范围内对人们进行登记，因为正如我们所知，在没收之前首先要进行登记。在我看来，没收是最终目标，因为司法部不希望有武装的公民。”
paraphrase_llama3: The ATF is seeking to expand its database of registered firearms, aiming to track individuals nationwide. This move may be a precursor to confiscation, as the Justice Department appears to prioritize disarming citizens.

src: He added, "But this Justice Department wants a registered citizenry, so they know who's got what, so they can come after us."
mt: 他补充说:"但司法部希望有注册公民,
ref: 他补充道，“而司法部想要一个注册的公民，所以他们想要知道谁有什么，他们会跟踪我们。”
paraphrase_llama3: He emphasized that the government is seeking a system where every citizen is registered, allowing them to track and potentially target individuals who possess certain item

src: Clyde's contention is that the ATF pistol brace rule was born in this environment of hostility toward the Second Amendment and toward private gun ownership, and he plans to fight it tooth and nail.
mt: 克莱德的观点是, 美国联邦警察局的枪支支支规则诞生于对第二修正案和私人枪支所有权的敌意环境中,
ref: 克莱德的论点是，ATF 手枪支架规则是在这种敌视第二修正案和私人拥有枪支的环境中诞生的，他计划竭尽全力与之斗争。
paraphrase_llama3: Clyde believes that the ATF's pistol brace rule was created in an atmosphere of hostility towards the Second Amendment and private gun ownership, and he intends to strongly contest i

src: He said he has "three tools" with which to fight the rule.
mt: 他表示他有"三种工具"来打击这一规则.
ref: 他说他有“三个工具”来对抗规则。
paraphrase_llama3: He claims to possess a trio of weapons to challenge the authorit

src: The first of those tools is the SHORT Act and the second is the Congressional Review Act.
mt: 美国国会的审查法案.
ref: 第一个工具是《SHORT 法案》，第二个是《国会审查法案》。
paraphrase_llama3: The first two tools are the SHORT Act and the Congressional Review Act, which can be used to address the issues.

src: On January 30 Breitbart News quoted Clyde outlining his plan to "reintroduce the Stop Harassing Owners of Rifles Today Act, or the SHORT Act, to repeal elements of the National Firearms Act, thereby prohibiting the ATF from registering and banning pistols with stabilizing braces."
mt: 1月30日,布赖特巴特新闻援引克莱德的说法,他概述了"重新引入"停止骚扰枪支所有者今天法案"或"SHORT法案",废除"国家枪支法案"的部分内容,从而禁止ATF注册和禁止带有稳定支架的手枪.
ref: 1 月 30 日，Breitbart News 援引 Clyde 概述了他的计划，即“重新引入《今日停止骚扰步枪拥有者法案》，或 SHORT 法案，以废除《国家火器法案》的内容，从而禁止 ATF 注册和禁止带有稳定支架的手枪。”
paraphrase_llama3: On January 30, a news outlet reported that Clyde planned to revive a bill to repeal certain provisions of the National Firearms Act, effectively blocking the ATF from regulating and banning handguns with stabilizing devices.

src: He also noted that he would "introduce a resolution of disapproval under the Congressional Review Act, to override the Biden administration's unlawful overreach."
mt: 他还指出,他将"根据国会审查法案提出一个不赞成决议, 推翻拜登政府的非法超越".
ref: 他还指出，他将“根据国会审查法案提出一项不赞成的决议，以推翻拜登政府的非法越权行为。”
paraphrase_llama3: He plans to propose a disapproval resolution under the Congressional Review Act, which would allow him to counter the Biden administration's actions that he considers unjustified.

src: Both acts, the SHORT Act and the Congressional Review Act, have the possibility of blocking the ATF pistol brace rule.
mt: 两项法案,即"短暂法案"和"国会审查法案",都有可能阻止ATF的手枪支架规则.
ref: 这两项法案，即《SHORT 法案》和《国会审查法案》，都有可能阻止 ATF 手枪支架规则。
paraphrase_llama3: The two laws, the SHORT Act and the Congressional Review Act, could potentially prevent the implementation of the ATF's pistol brace regulation.

src: But as Clyde told Breitbart News Thursday, the great challenge is that both of those routes will ultimately require President Biden's signature, either to enact the SHORT Act legislation or to finalize a resolution of disapproval under the Congressional Review Act.
mt: 但正如克莱德周四对"布雷特巴特新闻"所说, 面临的最大挑战是, 这两种途径最终都需要拜登总统的签名,
ref: 但是，正如克莱德周四告诉 Breitbart News 的那样，最大的挑战是，这两条路线最终都需要拜登总统的签署，要么颁布短法案立法，要么根据国会审查法案最终确定不批准的决议。
paraphrase_llama3: According to Clyde, the major hurdle is that both alternatives need President Biden's approval, either by signing the SHORT Act bill or by signing off on a disapproval resolution under the Congressional Review Act.

src: He made clear that getting Biden's signature is not an impossibility, as there are ways; for instance, the SHORT Act legislation could be added to other, larger bills that Democrats are very anxious to pass.
mt: 他明确表示, 获得拜登的签名并非不可能, 因为有很多方法; 例如, 短法案立法可以被添加到其他更大的法案中, 民主党人非常渴望通过.
ref: 他明确表示，得到拜登的签名不是不可能的，因为有办法；例如，短法案立法可以加入民主党人非常渴望通过的其他更大的法案中。
paraphrase_llama3: He emphasized that obtaining Biden's signature is not out of the question, as there are viable options; for instance, the SHORT Act could be incorporated into bigger bills that Democrats are eager to pas

src: However, Clyde indicated there is also a third way to block the ATF pistol brace rule.
mt: 克莱德表示还有第三种方法可以阻止ATF的手枪支架规则.
ref: 然而，克莱德指出，还有第三种方式来阻止 ATF 手枪支架规则。
paraphrase_llama3: Clyde also mentioned an alternative method to circumvent the ATF's regulation on pistol brace

src: He said: "I'm on the Appropriations Committee and we can defund this pistol brace rule, through what is called a limitation amendment. We can literally defund this rule and basically say, "No money may be spent executing or enforcing this particular pistol brace rule."
mt: 他说:"我在拨款委员会, 我们可以通过所谓的限制修正案, 取消这项枪支支支架规则的资金. 我们可以从字面上取消这项规则,
ref: 他表示：“我是拨款委员会的成员，我们可以通过所谓的限制修正案来废除这项手枪支架规则。我们可以从字面上解除这一规则，基本上可以说，“没有钱可以用来执行或实施这一特殊的手枪支架规则。”
paraphrase_llama3: The speaker mentioned that he is a member of the Appropriations Committee and has the power to reject the pistol brace rule by inserting a clause that prohibits funding for its implementation.

src: And we can also do the very same thing with the ATF receiver/frame rule, from last August.
mt: 我们也可以用去年8月的ATF接收器/规则做同样的事情.
ref: 从去年八月开始，我们也可以用 ATF 接收器/框架规则做同样的事情。
paraphrase_llama3: We can apply the same principle to the ATF receiver/frame rule that was introduced in Augus

src: I think both of them need to be defunded and I look forward to working with our appropriators to do it.
mt: 我认为这两种项目都需要撤销资金,
ref: 我认为这两者都需要被解除资助，我期待着与我们的拨款人一起工作。
paraphrase_llama3: I believe it is necessary to cut funding for both of them, and I am eager to collaborate with our budget allocators to make it happen.

src: AWR Hawkins is an award-winning Second Amendment columnist for Breitbart News and the writer/curator of Down Range with AWR Hawkins, a weekly newsletter focused on all things Second Amendment, also for Breitbart News.
mt: 霍金斯是一位获奖的第二修正案专作家,也是"AWR霍金斯"的 Down Range 的作家/策展人,这是一个每周一期的新闻通讯,专注于第二修正案,也是为"Breitbart News"而出版的.
ref: AWR·霍金斯是布赖特巴特新闻的获奖第二修正案专栏作家，也是 AWR·霍金斯的作家/策展人，这是一份专注于第二修正案所有事情的每周时事通讯，也是布赖特巴特新闻的记者。
paraphrase_llama3: AWR Hawkins is a renowned columnist who writes about gun rights for Breitbart News, and he also curates a weekly newsletter called Down Range, which covers Second Amendment issues.

src: He is the political analyst for Armed American Radio and a Turning Point USA Ambassador.
mt: 他是美国武装广播电台的政治分析师,
ref: 他是美国武装电台的政治分析家，也是美国折中大使。
paraphrase_llama3: He serves as a political analyst for Armed American Radio and is also a representative for Turning Point US

src: AWR Hawkins holds a PhD in Military History, with a focus on the Vietnam War (brown water navy), U.S. Navy since Inception, the Civil War, and Early Modern Europe.
mt: 霍金斯拥有军事史博士学位,专注于越南战争 (棕色水海军),美国海军自成立以来,内战和现代欧洲早期.
ref: AWR·霍金斯拥有军事历史博士学位，研究重点是越战（褐水海军）、美国海军成立以来、南北战争和早期现代欧洲。
paraphrase_llama3: Hawkins has a doctorate in Military History, specializing in the Vietnam War, the U.S. Navy's history from its inception, the American Civil War, and Early Modern Europ
