ref: 在 Instagram 上关注他：@awr_hawkins。
paraphrase_llama3: You can find him on Instagram under the handle @awr_hawkins.

src: You can sign up to get Down Range at breitbart.com/downrange.
mt: 您可以在breitbart.com/downrange上注册获得"下游范围".
ref: 你可以通过 breitbart.com/downrange 报名参加 Down Range。
paraphrase_llama3: To receive updates on Down Range, visit breitbart.com/downrange and registe

src: Reach him directly at awrhawkins@breitbart.com.
mt: 通过Awrhawkins@breitbart.com直接与他联系.
ref: 直接通过 awrhawkins@breitbart.com 寻找他。
paraphrase_llama3: You can contact him directly via his email address awrhawkins@breitbart.com.

src: 'We Hope' Biden Has a Plan for Handling Title 42 Ending, 'If They Do, They Haven't Shared It Fully'
mt: 拜登有计划处理第42号法案, 结尾是:"如果他们有计划, 他们还没有完全分享"
ref: 我们希望拜登有一个处理第 42 条结尾的计划，如果他们有，他们还没有完全将其共享出来
paraphrase_llama3: 'It is expected that President Biden will have a strategy in place for dealing with the consequences of ending Title 42, but so far, this plan has not been fully disclosed.'

src: On Friday's edition of NBC's "MTP Now," Colorado Gov. Jared Polis (D) said that he has "a lot of concern" over what will happen when Title 42 ends in May, he hopes the Biden administration has a plan for when the policy ends, and that "If they do, they haven't shared it fully with us yet."
mt: 科罗拉多州州长杰里德·波利斯 (D) 在周五的NBC"MTP Now"节目中表示,他对5月份第42号法案到期时会发生什么事"非常担心",他希望拜登政府有计划,以及"如果他们这样做,他们还没有完全与我们分享".
ref: 在美国全国广播公司周五的“MTP 时事”节目中，科罗拉多州州长 Jared Polis （D）表示，他“非常担心”第 42 条在 5 月结束时会发生什么，他希望拜登政府对该政策何时结束有一个计划，“如果他们有，他们还没有完全将其共享出来。”
paraphrase_llama3: Colorado's Governor expressed his worries about the upcoming end of Title 42 in May and urged the Biden administration to reveal their plan for handling the situation.

src: And said that "we've said, you need a plan. We want them to vet it with us."
mt: 我们说,你需要一个计划. 我们希望他们与我们一起审查.
ref: 并说“我们已经说过，你需要一个计划。我们想让他们和我们一起检查。”
paraphrase_llama3: They emphasized the importance of having a plan, and requested that it be reviewed and approved by both parties.

src: Polis stated that he wishes that more time was spent on the issue of immigration during the meeting of governors at the White House, but the issue "came up."
mt: 波利斯表示他希望在白宫的州长会议上花更多时间讨论移民问题,
ref: 波利斯表示，他希望在白宫举行的州长会议期间，在移民问题上花更多的时间，但这个问题“出现了”。
paraphrase_llama3: Polis expressed his desire for the governors' meeting at the White House to dedicate more time to discussing immigration, although the topic was briefly touched upon.

src: We did have Secretary Mayorkas there for part of it.
mt: 我们确实有部长Mayorkas在那里的一部分.
ref: 我们确实有马约卡斯部长在场。
paraphrase_llama3: The Secretary of Homeland Security, Mayorkas, was present for a portion of the event.

src: And so, we brought up, again, there's a lot of concern I share about what will happen when Title 42 ends in May and so, making sure that the federal government has a plan.
mt: 我们再次提到了我也同样担心42号法令在5月份到期后会发生什么,
ref: 所以，我们再次提出，当第 42 条在 5 月结束时，我有很多担心，所以，确保联邦政府有一个计划。
paraphrase_llama3: We reiterate our concerns about the impact of Title 42's expiration in May, and emphasize the need for a federal plan to address the issue.

src: We hope they do.
mt: 我们希望他们能做到.
ref: 我们希望如此。
paraphrase_llama3: We wish they will take action.

src: If they do, they haven't shared it fully with us yet.
mt: 如果他们有,他们还没有完全与我们分享.
ref: 如果他们知道，他们也没有与我们完全将其共享出来。
paraphrase_llama3: They haven't revealed the information to us completely.

src: But we've said, you need a plan.
mt: 但我们已经说过,你需要一个计划.
ref: 但是我们说过，你需要一个计划。
paraphrase_llama3: It's essential to have a plan in place.

src: We want them to vet it with us.
mt: 我们希望他们与我们一起审查.
ref: 我们想让他们和我们一起检查。
paraphrase_llama3: We would like them to review it with us.

src: We want to make sure it's not what we experienced in December times five or times three, that would be a disaster for the country and it would be terrible for the Biden administration.
mt: 我们希望确保这不是我们在12月经历的5倍或3倍, 这将是国家的一场灾难,
ref: 我们希望确保这不是我们在 12 月经历的五次或三次，那将是国家的灾难，对拜登政府来说是可怕的。
paraphrase_llama3: We are concerned that the situation will not worsen to the extent of a five- or threefold increase of what we encountered in December, which would have catastrophic consequences for the country and damage the Biden administration's reputation.

src: Follow Ian Hanchett on Twitter @IanHanchett
mt: 在Twitter上关注伊恩·汉切特@IanHanchett
ref: 在 Twitter @IanHanchett 上关注 Ian Hanchett
paraphrase_llama3: You can find Ian Hanchett on Twitter by searching for his handle @IanHanchett.

src: McDonald's withdraws "tasteless" advert near crematorium - RT World News
mt: 麦当劳撤回了火葬场附近的"无味"广告
ref: 麦当劳撤回火葬场附近的“无味”广告
paraphrase_llama3: McDonald's has pulled an advertisement near a crematorium due to concerns it was in poor taste.

src: McDonald's has apologized after an advertisement for the fast-food chain's "McCrispy" burger was placed close to a crematorium in the UK - although some locals did see the funny side.
mt: 麦当劳在快餐连锁店"麦克里斯比"汉堡的广告被贴在英国火葬场附近后, 已经道歉 - - 尽管一些当地人确实看到了有趣的一面.
ref: 在英国，麦当劳快餐连锁店的“麦可思比”汉堡的广告被放置在火葬场附近后，麦当劳已经道歉——尽管一些当地人确实看到了有趣的一面。
paraphrase_llama3: A McDonald's advertisement for their "McCrispy" burger was mistakenly placed near a crematorium in the UK, prompting an apology from the company. While some residents found the situation amusing, others were offended.

src: The restaurant chain has pledged to remove the offending advertising hoarding following complaints from residents of Truro in the UK county of Cornwall.
mt: 由于英国康沃尔郡特鲁罗居民的投诉, 这家连锁餐厅承诺将删除令人反感的广告.
ref: 在接到英国康沃尔郡特鲁罗居民的投诉后，这家连锁餐厅承诺拆除违规的广告牌。
paraphrase_llama3: The restaurant has promised to take down the unwanted billboard after locals in Truro, Cornwall, UK, expressed their discontent.

src: It had gained attention on social media on Friday for being placed on a busy road directly opposite an establishment which offers cremation services.
mt: 星期五在社交媒体上引起了人们的关注,
ref: 周五，它在社交媒体上引起了关注，因为它被放置在一条繁忙的道路上，正对着一家提供火葬服务的机构。
paraphrase_llama3: A funeral home located on a main street caught people's eyes on social media when it was placed in a spot directly across from a business that provides cremation service

src: The brightly lit advert, which was placed directly behind a sign pointing to the crematorium, was branded as "tasteless" by some angry locals.
mt: 广告的亮光被贴在火葬场的标志后面,
ref: 这个灯光明亮的广告直接放在一个指向火葬场的标志后面，被一些愤怒的当地人称为“无味”。
paraphrase_llama3: The large, well-lit advertisement, situated near a sign indicating the crematorium, sparked outrage among some residents who deemed it insensitiv

src: "Although I can see the funny side, it is tasteless and I'm sure some grieving family members won't like to see it when visiting Penmount for the funeral and cremation of a loved one," said a resident whose mother-in-law was cremated at the funeral home last year, as quoted by British media.
mt: "虽然我能看到有趣的一面, 但它是无味的, 我相信一些悲伤的家庭成员不会喜欢看到它,
ref: 英国媒体援引一位居民的话说：“虽然我能看到有趣的一面，但它毫无品味，我敢肯定，一些悲伤的家庭成员不会喜欢在前往彭芒特参加亲人的葬礼和火葬时看到它，”他的岳母去年在殡仪馆火化。
paraphrase_llama3: "Despite its humorous aspect, this display is in poor taste and I'm certain some bereaved relatives will be offended by it when visiting the funeral home to pay their respects to a deceased loved one."

src: However, not everyone was quite so offended by the unfortunate placement of the advertisement, with one noting that a person's reaction to it would likely be influenced by "how long ago you followed the crematorium sign wearing a black tie."
mt: 另一位评论员说,人们对这张广告的反应可能会受到"你是多久以前穿着黑领带跟着火葬场的标志"的影响.
ref: 然而，并不是每个人都因为广告的不当位置而受到冒犯，其中一个人指出，一个人对它的反应可能会受到“你多久前戴着黑色领带跟随火葬场标志”的影响。
paraphrase_llama3: Not everyone was upset by the ad's placement, as one person suggested that people's reactions would depend on how recently they had passed the crematorium while dressed formall

src: One person said they "fell off the chair laughing" when they spotted the advert online, while it was also noted by another local that it was "no worse" than the council's decision to entertain the idea of allowing a crematorium to be built "next door to a retirement village."
mt: 另一个当地人也指出, 这"不比"市政委员会决定允许"退休村隔壁"建一个火葬场的想法"更糟".
ref: 一个人说，当他们在网上看到这个广告时，他们“笑得从椅子上掉了下来”，而另一个当地人也指出，这个广告“不比市政会考虑允许火葬场建在“退休村隔壁”的想法更糟”。
paraphrase_llama3: Some people were so amused by the advert that they couldn't help but burst out laughing, and another local even compared it to a previous council decision that they considered equally bizarr

src: A statement issued by McDonald's was published by local media on Friday soon after an image of the advertisement went viral online, in which the restaurant chain said it would remove the advert as soon as possible.
mt: 麦当劳在广告图像在网上传播后不久, 当地媒体在周五发表了麦当劳的声明, 连锁餐厅表示将尽快删除广告.
ref: 周五，在该广告的图片在网上疯传后不久，当地媒体发表了麦当劳的一份声明，这家连锁餐厅表示将尽快删除该广告。
paraphrase_llama3: A statement from McDonald's was released by local media outlets on Friday, following the rapid spread of an image of the advertisement on social media. The company announced that it would take down the ad as soon as possibl

src: "We were unaware of the road sign in the vicinity of this bus stop. However, in light of the concerns raised by CornwallLive, we have asked for our advertisement to be removed," the fast-food brand said.
mt: "我们不知道公交车站附近的路标有什么, 但鉴于康沃尔直播的关注, 我们要求删除广告", 快餐品牌说.
ref: 这家快餐品牌表示：“我们没有注意到这个公共汽车站附近的路标。然而，鉴于 CornwallLive 提出的担忧，我们已经要求撤掉我们的广告。”
paraphrase_llama3: "We didn't notice the road sign near the bus stop where our ad was displayed. But after hearing concerns from CornwallLive, we've asked them to take down our ad

src: Cornwall Council, which operates both the crematorium and the bus shelter which displays the advert, declined the comment on the furor when contacted by local media.
mt: 康沃尔市政府在当地媒体的联系中拒绝对这场作发表评论.
ref: 当地媒体联系康沃尔郡议会时，该委员会拒绝就这一狂热发表评论。康沃尔郡议会同时运营着火葬场和展示广告的公交车站。
paraphrase_llama3: When approached by local media, Cornwall Council refused to comment on the controversy surrounding the crematorium and the bus shelter display.

src: 'Gut instinct' missing woman is not in river
mt: 失踪的女性并没有在河里
ref: 直觉告诉他该女性不在河里
paraphrase_llama3: The search for the missing woman has not yielded any signs of her being in the rive

src: Searches for missing English woman Nicola Bulley have entered a 16th day after her partner said his "gut instinct" is that she is not in the river.
mt: 搜寻失踪的英国妇女尼古拉·布利已经进入第16天,
ref: 对失踪的英国女子尼古拉·布利的搜寻已经进入第 16 天，她的搭档说他的“直觉”是她不在河里。
paraphrase_llama3: The search for Nicola Bulley, an English woman who went missing, has now entered its 16th day, with her partner expressing his intuition that she is unlikely to be found in the river.

src: Lancashire Police said officers are keeping an "open mind" while continuing to appeal for information about Ms Bulley, who disappeared on 27 January while walking her dog in St Michael's on Wyre.
mt: 兰开夏警方表示, 警方保持"开放的心态",
ref: 兰开夏郡警方表示，警方在继续呼吁提供关于布莉女士的信息时保持“开放的心态”，布莉女士于 1 月 27 日在怀尔的圣迈克尔遛狗时失踪。
paraphrase_llama3: The police in Lancashire are still investigating the disappearance of Ms Bulley, who went missing on January 27 while out with her dog, and are keeping all possibilities in mind as they seek any information that may help them solve the case.

src: The force is continuing to search the River Wyre towards the sea at Morecambe Bay, working on one hypothesis that the 45-year-old, from Inskip, could have fallen in.
mt: 警方正在继续搜查摩尔坎贝湾的韦尔河, 根据一个假设,
ref: 警方仍在继续搜索怀尔河流向莫肯贝湾的海域，根据一个假设，这名来自因斯基普的 45 岁男子可能是掉进河里的。
paraphrase_llama3: The search party is moving downstream along the River Wyre towards the sea at Morecambe Bay, focusing on the possibility that the missing 45-year-old man from Inskip may have accidentally entered the wate

src: Their search has been aided by specialists and divers from HM Coastguard, mountain rescue, and Lancashire Fire and Rescue Service, with sniffer dogs, drones, and police helicopters deployed.
mt: 搜寻人员得到了海上警卫队,山地救援,兰开夏消防救援服务的专家和潜水员的帮助,
ref: 他们的搜索得到了英国皇家海岸警卫队、山地救援队和兰开夏郡消防救援队的专家和潜水员的帮助，并部署了嗅探犬、无人机和警用直升机。
paraphrase_llama3: Experts and emergency responders from various agencies have joined forces to assist in the search, using specialized equipment like sniffer dogs, drones, and helicopters to scour the area.

src: Ms Bulley vanished while walking her springer spaniel Willow near the river, shortly after dropping her daughters, aged six and nine, at school.
mt: 布利女士在河边走她的小狗威洛时失踪,
ref: 布莉女士在把她六岁和九岁的女儿送到学校后不久，在河边遛她的斯宾格猎犬柳树时失踪了。
paraphrase_llama3: A woman named Ms Bulley disappeared while taking her dog, Willow, for a walk near a river, just after leaving her two daughters, aged six and nine, at school.

src: The mortgage adviser's phone was found on a bench overlooking the river, still connected to a work call.
mt: 房贷顾问的手机被发现在一张俯河的长椅上, 仍然与工作电话相连.
ref: 这位抵押贷款顾问的手机被发现放在一张俯瞰河流的长椅上，仍然连接着一个工作电话。
paraphrase_llama3: A phone belonging to the mortgage adviser was discovered on a riverbank, with the call still active.

src: Her partner, Paul Ansell said he wants to keep "all options open" about her disappearance, but his "gut instinct" tells him she is not in the river.
mt: 她的伴侣保罗·安塞尔说他希望保持"所有选择的开放"关于她的失踪,
ref: 她的伴侣保罗·安塞尔说，他希望对她的失踪保持“所有选项开放”，但他的“直觉”告诉他，她不在河里。
paraphrase_llama3: Paul Ansell, her partner, stated that he is considering all possibilities regarding her disappearance, but his initial hunch suggests that she is not in the river.

src: He described Ms Bulley as "fun," "loving," "the most loyal friend you could ever have" and an "exceptional mum" who "absolutely adores our girls."
mt: 他描述布利女士是"有趣的","有爱的", "你能拥有的最忠诚的朋友",
ref: 他将布莉女士描述为“有趣”、“可爱”、“你能拥有的最忠诚的朋友”以及“非常爱我们的女儿”的“杰出的妈妈”。
paraphrase_llama3: He spoke highly of Ms Bulley, praising her as a kind, loving, and devoted friend and mother who cherished her daughters.

src: "She's just a pillar of strength to our family and without her, the hole is bigger than you can possibly imagine," he told 5 News.
mt: "她只是我们家庭的支柱, 没有她, 洞是比你想象的要大", 他告诉5新闻.
ref: 他告诉 5 News：“她是我们家的支柱，没有她，这个深渊比你想象的还要大。”
paraphrase_llama3: "In our family, she is the rock that holds everything together, and her absence would be deeply felt."

src: Mr Ansell said that although the family is going through "unprecedented hell," hope that his partner will be found is "stronger than ever."
mt: 尽管这个家庭正经历"前所未有的地狱", 但希望他的伴侣能被找到,
ref: 安塞尔先生说，虽然这个家庭正在经历“前所未有的地狱”，但找到他的伴侣的希望“比以往任何时候都强烈”。
paraphrase_llama3: Despite the turmoil they are experiencing, Mr. Ansell expressed confidence that his partner will be found, as the family's determination has only grown stronge

src: Police have discounted foul play and are treating the incident as a missing person inquiry.
mt: 警方已经排除了凶手行为, 并将此事件视为失踪人员调查.
ref: 警方不认为这是谋杀，并将此事件视为失踪人口调查。
paraphrase_llama3: The police are investigating the disappearance as a missing person case, ruling out any possibility of foul play.

src: On Thursday, the focus of their search switched from St Michael's to around 10 miles downstream where the river empties into the sea at Morecambe Bay, with patrol and rescue boats spotted in the area.
mt: 周四, 他们的搜索重点从圣迈克尔转移到大约10英里下游,
ref: 周四，他们的搜索重点从圣迈克尔转移到下游约 10 英里处，那里是河流在莫克姆湾入海的地方，巡逻队和救援船在该地区开展工作。
paraphrase_llama3: The search efforts shifted from St Michael's to a nearby location, roughly 10 miles from the coast, where the river meets the sea at Morecambe Bay, with rescue vessels spotted in the vicinity.

src: East Germany's last communist leader dies at 95
mt: 东德最后一位共产党领袖95岁去世
ref: 东德最后一位共产党领导人去世，享年 95 岁
paraphrase_llama3: The former head of East Germany's communist government has passed away at the age of 95.

src: BERLIN (AP) - Hans Modrow, who served as East Germany's last communist leader during a turbulent tenure that ended in the country's first and only free election, has died.
mt: 德国的最后一个共产党领袖, 在这个国家第一个和唯一的自由选举结束的动荡时期,
ref: 柏林（美联社）-汉斯·莫德罗，东德最后一位共产党领导人，在混乱的任期内，结束了该国第一次也是唯一一次自由选举，与世长辞。
paraphrase_llama3: The former leader of East Germany, who oversaw the country's transition from communism to democracy, has passed away.

src: He was 95.
mt: 他95岁.
ref: 享年 95 岁。
paraphrase_llama3: At the age of 95, he was living.

src: Modrow died early Saturday, the Left party parliamentary group tweeted.
mt: 莫德罗在周六早些时候去世,
ref: 左翼党议会小组在推特上写道，莫德罗于周六早些时候去世。
paraphrase_llama3: The Left party's parliamentary group announced the death of Modrow on Saturday mornin

src: Modrow, a reform-minded communist, took over East Germany shortly after the Berlin Wall fell and later invited opposition forces into the government, but could not slow the gathering momentum for German reunification.
mt: 莫德罗是一位改革思想的共产主义者,在柏林墙倒塌后不久接管了东德,后来邀请反对派力量进入政府,但无法减缓德国统一的势头.
ref: 莫德罗，一个具有改革思想的共产主义者，在柏林墙倒塌后不久接管了东德，后来邀请反对派力量加入政府，但无法减缓德国统一的势头。
paraphrase_llama3: Modrow, a communist with progressive ideas, became the leader of East Germany after the Berlin Wall collapsed, and then allowed opposition groups to join the government, but ultimately failed to halt the growing push for German reunificatio

src: "The entire peaceful course of establishing German unity was precisely a special achievement of his," the Left wrote on Twitter."That will remain his political legacy."
mt: 德国的统一是他的特别成就, 这将是他的政治遗产.
ref: 左派人士在 Twitter 上写道：“建立德国统一的整个和平进程正是他的一项特殊成就，”“这将成为他的政治遗产。”
paraphrase_llama3: "The Left credits the leader with a remarkable accomplishment in bringing about a peaceful German reunification, which will be his lasting political legacy."

src: During 16 years as communist party chief in Dresden, starting in 1973, Modrow built a reputation as an anti-establishment figure.
mt: 在德累斯顿担任共产党首席的16年里,
ref: 从 1973 年开始，在担任德累斯顿共产党总书记的 16 年间，莫德罗建立了反体制人物的名声。
paraphrase_llama3: Modrow, who served as the communist party chief in Dresden for 16 years, beginning in 1973, earned a reputation as a nonconformist.

src: He rejected party perks and insisted on living in a normal apartment.
mt: 他拒绝参加派对,坚持住在普通公寓里.
ref: 他拒绝派对津贴，坚持住在普通公寓里。
paraphrase_llama3: He chose to give up the luxuries that came with his party position and preferred to live a humble life.

src: A post in East Germany's top leadership eluded him until he was made prime minister, a position that previously carried little clout, in November 1989 - days after the fall of the Berlin Wall.
mt: 东德最高领导层的职位在1989年11月,在柏林墙倒塌几天后,他被任命为总理,这个职位以前几乎没有影响力.
ref: 直到 1989 年 11 月，柏林墙倒塌后几天，他被任命为总理，这是一个以前没有什么影响力的职位。
paraphrase_llama3: Until November 1989, when the Berlin Wall fell, the man was unaware that he would soon become the Prime Minister of East Germany, a role that was previously insignifican

src: When hard-line leader Egon Krenz and his ruling Politburo resigned in early December, Modrow emerged as East Germany's top political figure.
mt: 莫德罗成为东德的最高政治人物.
ref: 当强硬派领导人埃贡·克伦茨和他的政治局在 12 月初辞职时，莫德罗成为东德的最高政治人物。
paraphrase_llama3: Egon Krenz's resignation in early December led to Modrow's rise as the most influential figure in East Germany's governmen

src: But the communists could no longer call the shots on their own.
mt: 现在,共产党人已经无法自主掌控.
ref: 但是共产主义者再也不能独自发号施令了。
paraphrase_llama3: The communists lost their control over the situation.

src: The following month, he agreed to share power with the increasingly vocal opposition and moved up East Germany's landmark first free election to March 1990, amid growing unrest.
mt: 接下来的一个月, 他同意与日益强烈的反对派分享权力, 并将东德的第一个具有里程碑意义的自由选举推迟到1990年3月,
ref: 接下来的一个月，他同意与呼声渐高的反对派共享权力，并将东德具有里程碑意义的第一次自由选举提前到 1990 年 3 月，当时动荡日益加剧。
paraphrase_llama3: In the following month, he accepted the need to share power with the growing opposition and hastened the date of East Germany's first free election to March 1990, amidst rising disconten

src: Even as pro-democracy rallies rapidly took on a pro-unification flavor, the communists initially had opposed talk of reunification.
mt: 尽管民主派集会迅速成为支持统一的口味,
ref: 支持民主的集会迅速发展，带有支持统一的色彩，而共产党最初反对统一的说法。
paraphrase_llama3: As the pro-democracy protests gained momentum, they began to shift towards a focus on reunification, but the communists were initially hesitant to discuss the ide

src: In February 1990, however, Modrow urged talks with West Germany toward an eventual "united fatherland" that would be independent of military blocs and governed by a joint parliament in Berlin.
mt: 1990年2月,莫德罗敦促与西德进行谈判, 争取最终建立一个"统一的祖国", 独立于军事集团, 在柏林由联合议会治理.
ref: 然而，1990 年 2 月，莫德罗敦促与西德进行谈判，以最终建立一个独立于军事集团、由柏林联合议会管理的“统一的祖国”。
paraphrase_llama3: Modrow suggested in 1990 that East Germany and West Germany should engage in discussions aimed at creating a unified nation, free from the influence of military alliances and with a single government in Berlin.

src: Modrow headed the election campaign of the restyled communists, the Party of Democratic Socialism, but his personal popularity was not enough to prevent them finishing as only the third-strongest party, with 16 percent support.
mt: 莫德罗领导了重新设计的共产党的竞选活动, 但他的个人声誉不足以阻止他们以16%的支持率成为第三强政党.
ref: 莫德罗领导了重建后的共产主义者民主社会主义党的竞选活动，但他的个人声望不足以阻止他们仅以 16% 的支持率成为第三大党。
paraphrase_llama3: Modrow led the election campaign of the reformed communists, the Party of Democratic Socialism, but despite his personal popularity, the party's performance was disappointing, securing only 16% of the vote and finishing thir

src: The winner was an alliance of conservative parties that favored quick reunification and was backed by the government of West German leader Helmut Kohl.
mt: 赢得了保守党的联盟, 支持迅速统一, 得到西德领导人赫尔穆特·科尔政府的支持.
ref: 获胜者是主张快速统一的保守派政党联盟，并得到西德领导人赫尔穆特·科尔政府的支持。
paraphrase_llama3: The victor was a coalition of right-wing parties that advocated for rapid reunification and received support from the government of West Germany, led by Chancellor Helmut Koh

src: Germany reunited under Kohl's leadership and as a NATO member on Oct. 3, 1990, less than a year after the fall of the Berlin Wall.
mt: 德国在科尔的领导下,在1990年10月3日重新团结,成为北约成员,
ref: 1990 年 10 月 3 日，在柏林墙倒塌不到一年后，德国在美国柯尔百货公司的领导下重新统一，并成为北约成员国。
paraphrase_llama3: Germany was reconstituted as a single nation under the guidance of Chancellor Kohl in October 1990, shortly after the Berlin Wall's collapse.

src: Modrow became a member of the united parliament, where he sat until 1994, and honorary chairman of the post-communist PDS - the predecessor of today's opposition Left party. From 1999 to 2004, he was a member of the European Parliament.
mt: 莫德罗成为联合议会的成员,直到1994年,并担任后共产党PDS的荣誉主席 - - 今天的反对党左翼党的前身.从1999年到2004年,他是欧洲议会的成员.
ref: 莫德罗成为了联合议会的成员，直到 1994 年，他还是后共产主义社会民主党的名誉主席，该党是今天的反对党左翼党的前身。从 1999 年到 2004 年，他是欧洲议会的成员。
paraphrase_llama3: Modrow joined the unified parliament, serving until 1994, and later became the honorary head of the post-communist PDS, which later transformed into the Left party. He was a member of the European Parliament from 1999

src: Modrow's past under hard-line communist rule landed him in court several years after reunification.
mt: 莫德罗在强硬的共产主义政权下的过去,
ref: 莫德罗过去在共产党的强硬统治下，在两德统一几年后被送上法庭。
paraphrase_llama3: Modrow's experiences during the communist era led to legal troubles for him several years after reunification.

src: In 1995, a court convicted him of inciting the falsification of results in May 1989 local elections in Dresden.
mt: 1995年, 法庭判定他煽动伪造1989年5月德累斯顿地方选举的结果.
ref: 1995 年，法院判定他在 1989 年 5 月德累斯顿地方选举中煽动伪造结果。
paraphrase_llama3: In 1995, a court found him guilty of manipulating election results in Dresden in 198

src: It handed him a nine-month suspended sentence and a fine.
mt: 判处他9个月的缓刑和罚款.
ref: 法院判处他 9 个月缓刑和罚款。
paraphrase_llama3: The court gave him a nine-month probation period and a financial penalt

src: Modrow claimed that the trial was politically motivated and asserted that its outcome would aggravate divisions between east and west Germans.
mt: 莫德罗声称审判是出于政治动机,并断言其结果将加剧东德和西德之间的分歧.
ref: 莫德罗声称审判是出于政治动机，并断言其结果将加剧东德和西德之间的分歧。
paraphrase_llama3: Modrow stated that the trial was driven by political considerations and predicted that its outcome would exacerbate the already existing divisions between East and West Germans.

src: His attorney argued that he had made amends for previous injustices by overseeing free elections as prime minister.
mt: 据他的律师称,
ref: 他的律师辩称，他作为总理监督了自由选举，从而弥补了之前的不公。
paraphrase_llama3: His lawyer claimed that by organizing democratic elections, his client had already made up for past wrongs committed as prime ministe

src: Later in life, Modrow served on the council of elders of the Left party.
mt: 后来,莫德罗成为左翼党的长老委员会成员.
ref: 晚年，莫德罗在左翼政党长老理事会任职。
paraphrase_llama3: Modrow later became a member of the council of elders of the Left party.

src: "Hans was a deeply sincere and combative socialist," tweeted Dietmar Bartsch, the chairman of the Left party parliamentary group.
mt: "汉斯是一个非常诚实和积极的社会主义者",
ref: 左翼党议会党团主席迪特马尔·巴奇在推特上表示：“汉斯是一个非常真诚和好斗的社会主义者。”
paraphrase_llama3: "Hans was a genuine and passionate advocate for socialism," said Dietmar Bartsch, the chairman of the Left party's parliamentary grou

src: "Until old age he was an important adviser in our party, whose wisdom will be missed."
mt: "他一直是我们党的重要顾问,
ref: “直到晚年，他一直是我党的重要顾问，我们将怀念他的智慧。”
paraphrase_llama3: "Until his advanced age, he played a significant role as a trusted counselor within our party, and his insightful guidance will be deeply felt."

src: Indian govt withdraws appeal to hug cows on Valentine's Day after criticism
mt: 印度政府在受到批评后撤回了情人节拥抱牛的呼吁
ref: 印度政府撤回在情人节拥抱奶牛的呼吁
paraphrase_llama3: The Indian government has decided to withdraw its appeal to celebrate Valentine's Day by hugging cows, following widespread criticis

src: Hugging a cow on Valentine's Day is no longer being encouraged by the Indian government - despite it previously asking people to do so to promote Hindu values.
mt: 印度政府不再鼓励人们在情人节拥抱牛,
ref: 印度政府不再鼓励在情人节拥抱一头奶牛，尽管此前政府曾要求人们这样做，以推广印度教价值观。
paraphrase_llama3: The Indian government has stopped promoting the practice of hugging cows on Valentine's Day, a tradition that was previously encouraged to promote Hindu value

src: The Animal Welfare Board of India (AWBI) retracted its "Cow Hug Day" appeal after it attracted criticism from political rivals and social media users.
mt: 印度动物福利委员会 (AWBI) 撤回了"牛拥抱日"的呼吁,
ref: 印度（AWBI）动物福利委员会撤回了其“抱牛日”的呼吁，此前该呼吁招致了政治对手和社交媒体用户的批评。
paraphrase_llama3: The Indian Animal Welfare Board withdrew its campaign to promote hugging cows, following backlash from political opponents and online users.

src: The Indian government department had called on citizens to deviate from Western romantic gestures celebrated on Valentine's Day.
mt: 印度政府部门呼吁公民在情人节时避免西方的浪漫手势.
ref: 印度政府部门呼吁公民在情人节这天不要做出西方的浪漫举动。
paraphrase_llama3: The Indian government department urged people to break away from traditional Western Valentine's Day custom

src: Nilanjan Mukhopadhyay, a political analyst, said the call to hug cows had been "absolutely crazy, defying logic."
mt: 尼兰·穆科帕德亚耶 (Nilanjan Mukhopadhyay) 是一位政治分析师,
ref: 政治分析家 Nilanjan Mukhopadhyay 表示，拥抱奶牛的呼吁“绝对疯狂，违背逻辑。”
paraphrase_llama3: A political expert, Nilanjan Mukhopadhyay, has described the proposal to hug cows as "utterly absurd and illogical".

src: He added that the decision to withdraw the appeal was more "to prevent the politics of Hindutva [Hindu nationalism] from being ridiculed in the face of severe criticism from all quarters."
mt: 他补充说,撤回上诉的决定更多是为了"防止印度教的政治被嘲笑,
ref: 他补充说，撤回上诉的决定更多的是为了“防止印度教民族主义（Hindutva）的政治在面临来自各方的严厉批评时受到嘲笑。”
paraphrase_llama3: He stated that the decision to withdraw the appeal was made to avoid the politics of Hindutva being mocked and discredited by the severe criticism it faced from all sides.

src: The AWBI reneged on its appeal on Friday saying it "stands withdrawn."
mt: 美国联邦调查局 (AWBI) 周五拒绝上诉,
ref: AWBI 周五否认了其上诉，称其“撤回”
paraphrase_llama3: The AWBI withdrew its appeal on Friday, stating it no longer intended to procee

src: It was only on Wednesday when its statement read that "hugging cows [would] bring emotional richness and increase individual and collective happiness."
mt: 只有周三, 官方声明才说"拥抱牛会带来情感丰富, 增加个人和集体的幸福".
ref: 直到周三，它的声明才写道“拥抱奶牛（将）带来丰富的情感，增加个人和集体福祉。”
paraphrase_llama3: According to its statement on Wednesday, embracing cows can lead to a sense of emotional fulfillment and boost both personal and social well-bein

src: More on India
mt: 更多关于印度
ref: 更多关于印度的信息
paraphrase_llama3: India's story continues

src: It added that the cow is the "backbone of Indian culture and rural economy... because of its nourishing nature like [a] mother."
mt: 牛是"印度文化和农村经济的支柱......因为它像母一样滋养人".
ref: 它补充说，奶牛是“印度文化和农村经济的支柱”...因为它像母亲一样有滋养的天性。”
paraphrase_llama3: The cow is an integral part of Indian culture and rural life due to its ability to provide sustenance, much like a mother's nurturing care.

src: There were mixed reactions to the initial announcement as some posted videos of cows rejecting being hugged and charging off.
mt: 部分人发布了一些牛拒绝被拥抱并逃跑的视频.
ref: 人们对最初的声明反应不一，一些人上传了奶牛拒绝被拥抱并逃跑的视频。
paraphrase_llama3: The public's response to the news was divided, with some sharing clips of cows reacting negatively to being cuddled and then fleeing.

src: Others wanted to clarify that the appeal was more for following one's own culture, as opposed to "blindly" following Western values.
mt: 其他人则想澄清, 呼吁更多的是遵循自己的文化, 而不是"盲目"遵循西方价值观.
ref: 其他人希望澄清，呼吁更多的是遵循自己的文化，而不是“盲目”遵循西方价值观。
paraphrase_llama3: The intention was to highlight the importance of preserving one's cultural identity, rather than mindlessly adopting Western custom

src: Young Indians typically spend Valentine's Day crowding parks and restaurants, exchanging gifts and holding parties.
mt: 印度年轻人通常在情人节期间挤在公园和餐馆,
ref: 年轻的印度人通常在拥挤的公园和餐馆里度过情人节，交换礼物并举行聚会。
paraphrase_llama3: On Valentine's Day, Indian youth often flock to public spaces like parks and eateries, engaging in gift-giving and socializing.

src: Cow cuddling is nothing new either - with it being considered therapeutic in parts of the world, and in The Netherlands where it is known as "koe knuffelen."
mt: 牛的拥抱也不是什么新鲜事 - - 在世界某些地方被认为是治疗的, 在荷兰被称为"koe knuffelen".
ref: 拥抱奶牛也不是什么新鲜事——在世界的一些地方，它被认为是一种治疗方法，在荷兰，它被称为“koe knuffelen”。
paraphrase_llama3: In some regions, cow cuddling is viewed as a therapeutic activity, and in the Netherlands, it's called "koe knuffelen."

src: Devout Hindus worship the cow - known as gau mata, or "mother cow" - and most states in India have banned cow slaughter.
mt: 印度的虔诚印度教徒崇拜牛, 称为"母牛" (gau mata), 印度大多数州禁止杀牛.
ref: 虔诚的印度教徒崇拜这种被称为 gau mata 或“母牛”的牛，印度大多数邦都禁止宰杀牛。
paraphrase_llama3: In Hinduism, the cow is revered as a sacred animal, and many Indian states have implemented laws prohibiting the slaughter of cows.

src: In recent years, certain Hindu hard-liners have raided shops selling Valentine's Day items, burned cards and gifts, and chased hand-holding couples out of restaurants and parks, insisting that the day goes against traditional values and promotes promiscuity.
mt: 最近几年,某些印度教强硬派袭击了卖情人节物品的商店,烧毁卡片和礼物,并把手拉手的夫妇赶出餐馆和公园, 坚称这一天违背了传统价值观, 促进了乱伦.
ref: 近年来，某些印度教强硬派袭击了出售情人节商品的商店，焚烧卡片和礼物，并将手拉手的情侣赶出餐馆和公园，坚称这一天违背传统价值观，助长滥交。
paraphrase_llama3: In recent times, some Hindu extremists have been attacking stores selling Valentine's Day products, destroying cards and gifts, and even forcing couples to leave restaurants and parks, claiming that the day contradicts traditional values and encourages immoralit

src: Hindu nationalist groups such as Shiv Sena and Bajrang Dal have said such raids help reassert a Hindu identity.
mt: 印度民族主义团体如希夫塞纳和巴杰朗达尔表示,
ref: 印度教民族主义团体，如 Shiv Sena 和 Bajrang Dal 说，这种袭击有助于重申印度教的身份。
paraphrase_llama3: Hindu extremist groups, including Shiv Sena and Bajrang Dal, claim that these raids serve to reinforce a sense of Hindu prid

src: Critics of Prime Minister Narendra Modi say his government has pushed a Hindu agenda, seeking the religion's supremacy in a secular nation known for its diversity.
mt: 印度政府在一个以多元化而闻名的世俗国家中寻求宗教至高无上的地位.
ref: 总理纳伦德拉·莫迪的批评者说，莫迪政府推动了一项印度教议程，在一个以多样性著称的世俗国家寻求宗教至高无上的地位。
paraphrase_llama3: The critics argue that the Modi government has been promoting a Hindu-centric approach, aiming to dominate the country's pluralistic society.

src: While Hindus comprise almost 80% of the nearly 1.4 billion people, Muslims, Christians, Sikhs, Buddhists and Jains account for most of the rest.
mt: 印度教占近14亿人口的近80%, 穆斯林,基督徒,锡克教徒,佛教徒和教徒占其余大部分.
ref: 虽然印度教徒占近 14 亿人口的近 80%，但穆斯林、基督徒、锡克教徒、佛教徒和耆那教徒占其余的大部分。
paraphrase_llama3: The majority of the world's population, approximately 1.4 billion people, are Hindus, with the remaining population consisting of a diverse range of religious groups, including Muslims, Christians, Sikhs, Buddhists, and Jains.

src: Pedestrian dies in hospital after crash with car in Cowdenbeath as man arrested
mt: 路人死在医院后与汽车在考登比斯撞击,作为一个人被捕
ref: 在 Cowdenbeath 与汽车相撞后，行人在医院死亡，男子被捕
paraphrase_llama3: A pedestrian succumbed to injuries in hospital following a collision with a vehicle in Cowdenbeath, with the driver subsequently being taken into custody.

src: A pedestrian has died following a collision with a car in Fife.
mt: 一名行人因与汽车相撞而死亡.
ref: 一名行人在法夫与一辆汽车相撞后死亡。
paraphrase_llama3: A fatal accident occurred in Fife when a pedestrian was hit by a car.

src: The 38-year-old female was rushed to Victoria Hospital in Kirkcaldy following the crash on Broad Street in Cowdenbeath on Friday around 1.30pm.
mt: 这位38岁的女性在周五下午1点30分左右在Cowdenbeath的Broad Street发生事故后被赶往Kirkcaldy的维多利亚医院.
ref: 这位 38 岁的女性在周五下午 1：30 左右考登比思的布罗德街发生车祸后被紧急送往柯克卡尔迪的维多利亚医院
paraphrase_llama3: A 38-year-old woman was taken to Victoria Hospital in Kirkcaldy after a car accident on Broad Street in Cowdenbeath on Friday afternoon.

src: A 24-year-old man has subsequently been arrested in connection with the crash.
mt: 随后一名24岁的男子因与这起事故有关而被捕.
ref: 一名二十四岁男子其后因涉嫌与意外有关而被捕。
paraphrase_llama3: A 24-year-old male has been detained by the authorities in relation to the acciden

src: Police are appealing for any witnesses or anyone with dash-cam footage to come forward.
mt: 警方呼吁任何目击者或任何有仪表盘摄像头录像的人,
ref: 警方呼吁任何目击者或任何有监控录像的人站出来。
paraphrase_llama3: The authorities are seeking the assistance of individuals who may have witnessed the incident or have recorded the event on their dash-cam to provide any relevant informatio

src: Sergeant Lee Walkingshaw said: "Our enquiries are ongoing and we are appealing for anyone who was in the area and who witnessed the crash to get in touch."
mt: 警官李·沃金肖说:"我们的调查仍在进行中,
ref: Sergeant Lee 中士表示：“我们的调查仍在进行中，我们呼吁任何在该地区的人和目睹坠机事件的人保持联系。”
paraphrase_llama3: The investigation is still ongoing, and we are asking anyone who was in the vicinity and saw the accident to contact us.

src: I would also appeal to anyone who was driving in the area and who may have dash-cam footage which could assist our investigation to contact us.
mt: 我也呼吁任何在该地区开车的人, 谁可能有仪表盘摄像头的录像,
ref: 我也呼吁在该地区开车的人和可能有 dash-cam 镜头的人与我们联系，这可能有助于我们的调查。
paraphrase_llama3: We are seeking help from anyone who was driving in the area and may have recorded footage on their dash cam that could aid our inves

src: "Anyone who can help is asked to call Police Scotland on 101, quoting incident number 1638 of Friday, February 10, 2023."
mt: "任何有帮助的人请致电苏格兰警察101, 引用2023年2月10日星期五的事件号码1638".
ref: “任何能提供帮助的人都被要求拨打苏格兰警察 101，引用 2023 年 2 月 10 日星期五的事件编号 1638。”
paraphrase_llama3: "The public is requested to contact Police Scotland on 101, mentioning incident number 1638, which occurred on February 10, 2023, if they can provide assistance

src: IN NUMBERS: The Oslo boroughs where the most foreigners live
mt: 总数:奥斯陆的外国居民最多的地区
ref: 在数字中：外国人最多的奥斯陆行政区
paraphrase_llama3: In the city of Oslo, the neighborhoods with the highest proportion of foreign residents are located.

src: Roughly 177,000 of Oslo's 634,000's residents have immigrated to Norway from other countries.
mt: 约有177,000名奥斯陆634,000名居民从其他国家移民到挪威.
ref: 奥斯陆 63.4 万居民中，大约有 17.7 万人从其他国家移民到挪威。
paraphrase_llama3: Around 28% of Oslo's population consists of people who have moved to Norway from abroad.

src: When you include those born in Oslo to foreign parents, the proportion of those who are immigrants or have an immigrant background rises to more than a third.
mt: 移民或移民背景的人口比例高达三分之一以上.
ref: 如果把出生在奥斯陆、父母是外国人的人计算在内，移民或有移民背景的人的比例将超过三分之一。
paraphrase_llama3: The percentage of people with an immigrant background increases significantly when you also count those born in Oslo to foreign parents.

src: In Oslo, citizens from Asia, including Turkey, made up the largest immigrant group, with over 62,985 of these nationals living in the city, according to figures from the national data agency Statistics Norway (SSB).
mt: 根据国家数据机构挪威统计局 (SSB) 的数据,在奥斯陆,包括土耳其在内的亚洲公民是最大的移民群体,其中超过62,985名这些国民生活在城市.
ref: 根据国家数据机构挪威统计局（SSB）的数据，在奥斯陆，包括土耳其在内的亚洲公民构成了最大的移民群体，其中超过 62985 人生活在这座城市。
paraphrase_llama3: In Oslo, the largest immigrant group came from Asia, with Turkey being a significant contributor, with a staggering 62,985 nationals calling the city home, as per data from Norway's national statistics agency.

src: After that, citizens from the EU, EEA and the UK made up the second largest group, accounting for not far off 10 percent of the city's population.
mt: 欧盟,欧洲经济区和英国的公民是第二大群体,
ref: 之后，来自欧盟、欧洲经济区和英国的公民组成了第二大群体，占该市人口的 10%。
paraphrase_llama3: The second-largest demographic in the city was made up of citizens from the EU, EEA, and the UK, who collectively accounted for approximately 10% of the population.

src: Africans made up the third largest group of immigrants in Oslo, with 28,020 people from Africa living in Oslo.
mt: 非洲人是奥斯陆第三大移民群体,来自非洲的28 020人居住在奥斯陆.
ref: 非洲人是奥斯陆第三大移民群体，有 28020 名非洲人居住在奥斯陆。
paraphrase_llama3: Oslo is home to a significant number of immigrants from Africa, with over 28,000 Africans calling the city their home.

src: Europeans from countries that aren't part of the UK, EU or EEA were the fourth largest group, accounting for 15,566 Oslo residents.
mt: 来自非英国,欧盟或欧洲经济区国家的欧洲人是第四大群体,占奥斯陆居民的15566人.
ref: 来自不属于英国、欧盟或欧洲经济区的欧洲人是第四大群体，有 15566 名奥斯陆居民。
paraphrase_llama3: Non-UK, EU, and EEA European nationals made up the fourth largest group in Oslo, comprising 15,566 residents.

src: From here, the size of the groups drops significantly.
mt: 群体的规模从此就会大幅下降.
ref: 从这里开始，群体的规模显著下降。
paraphrase_llama3: As we move forward, the number of people in each group decreases noticeabl

src: For example, there were just shy of 7,000 citizens from South American countries in 2022, while there was a smidge over 3,000 nationals hailing from North and Central America.
mt: 例如,在2022年,南美国家只有不到7,000名公民,而来自北美和中美洲的公民则少不到3000人.
ref: 例如，2022 年，来自南美国家的公民不到 7000 人，而来自北美和中美洲的公民略多于 3000 人。
paraphrase_llama3: In 2022, the number of citizens from South America was close to 7,000, whereas the number of citizens from North and Central America was slightly above 3,000.

src: Meanwhile, there were less than 700 people from Oceania in Oslo.
mt: 欧斯陆的海洋居民不到700.
ref: 与此同时，奥斯陆只有不到 700 名来自大洋洲的人。
paraphrase_llama3: Only a small group of approximately 700 individuals from Oceania were present in Oslo at the same time.

src: Alna, in the northeast of the city, was the borough with the most foreign residents.
mt: 城市东北部的阿尔纳是最多外籍居民的区.
ref: 位于城市东北部的阿尔纳是外国居民最多的行政区。
paraphrase_llama3: In the northeastern part of the city, the borough with the highest percentage of foreign residents was Alna.

src: Some 18,257 foreign residents were registered as living there in 2022.
mt: 在2022年,约有18,257名外国居民被注册为居住在该国.
ref: 2022 年，约有 18257 名外国居民登记居住在那里。
paraphrase_llama3: As of 2022, there were 18,257 foreign residents recorded as residing in the area.

src: Afterwards, trendy Grünerløkka, located reasonably centrally, had the second highest number of foreign residents, with 17,631.
mt: 之后,位于相当中心的时尚格鲁内尔洛卡 (Grünerløkka) 拥有第二高的外国居民人数,为17,631人.
ref: 之后，时尚的 grünerl kka 位于市中心，拥有 17631 名外国居民，位居第二。
paraphrase_llama3: Following the area mentioned earlier, Grünerløkka, which is relatively central, has the second highest number of foreign residents, with a total of 17,63

src: Gamle Oslo also had a significant immigrant population, with 17,631 people living there after moving from another country.
mt: 旧奥斯陆也拥有大量移民人口,其中有17,631人从其他国家搬到这里.
ref: Gamle Oslo 也有大量的移民人口，有 17631 人从另一个国家移居到这里。
paraphrase_llama3: Oslo's elderly district was home to a substantial number of immigrants, with approximately 17,631 individuals having relocated from abroad.

src: Statistics Norway's figures showed that foreigners were scattered all over the city's districts, as Søndre Nordstrand, the borough furthest south in Oslo, had over 14,000 immigrants registered there.
mt: 挪威统计局的数据显示,外国人分散在城市各个地区,因为奥斯陆最南端的Søndre Nordstrand市区有超过14,000名移民登记.
ref: 挪威统计局的数据显示，外国人分散在奥斯陆的各个区，奥斯陆最南端的圣德勒诺斯特兰德区有超过 14000 名移民在那里登记。
paraphrase_llama3: According to Statistics Norway, immigrants were dispersed across the city's neighborhoods, with Søndre Nordstrand, Oslo's southernmost borough, having the highest concentration with over 14,000 registere

src: Many immigrants also lived in sought-after areas, as Frogner was the district with the fifth most foreigners.
mt: 许多移民也住在受欢迎的地区,因为弗罗格纳是第五大外国人区.
ref: 许多移民也住在受欢迎的地区，因为 Frogner 是外国人第五多的地区。
paraphrase_llama3: Apart from other districts, many immigrants also chose to reside in the most popular areas, with Frogner being the fifth most preferred district for foreign nationals.

src: After that, Stovner, Bjerke, Grorud, Østensjø and Sagene made up the rest of the ten districts in Oslo with the most residents from another country.
mt: 斯托夫纳,比尔克,格罗鲁德,奥斯斯约和萨格内成为奥斯陆十个地区中最多外籍居民的地区.
ref: 之后，Stovner、Bjerke、Grorud、stensjø和 Sagene 组成了奥斯陆其他十个区，来自其他国家的居民最多。
paraphrase_llama3: The remaining five districts in Oslo with the highest number of foreign residents were Stovner, Bjerke, Grorud, Østensjø, and Sagen

src: At the other end of the spectrum, just 184 foreign residents called Marka home, and just over 700 lived in the city's central borough.
mt: 只有184名外国人住在马卡,
ref: 在另一端，只有 184 名外国居民称马尔卡为家，只有 700 多名居住在该市的中心区。
paraphrase_llama3: On the opposite end of the scale, a mere 184 foreigners resided in Marka, while approximately 700 people inhabited the city's central district.

src: Ullern, Vestre Aker and Nordstrand made up the other boroughs with the fewest foreign residents.
mt: 乌勒恩,维斯特拉·阿克和诺德斯特兰德是其他最少外国人居住的市区.
ref: 乌尔恩、维斯特雷·阿克和诺斯特兰德是其他外来人口最少的行政区。
paraphrase_llama3: The remaining boroughs, including Ullern, Vestre Aker, and Nordstrand, had the smallest proportion of foreign residents.

src: However, these boroughs had significantly more immigrants living there than in central Oslo and Marka.
mt: 然而,这些区的移民人口明显高于奥斯陆中心和马卡.
ref: 然而，这些自治市的移民数量明显多于奥斯陆市中心和马尔卡市。
paraphrase_llama3: While the boroughs had a higher proportion of immigrants compared to central Oslo and Marka, they still had a considerable number of foreign-born resident

src: Those from EU and EEA countries and those from the United Kingdom mostly lived in Frogner, Grünerløkka, Gamle Oslo and St. Hanshaugen.
mt: 来自欧盟和欧洲经济区国家的移民和来自英国的移民主要居住在弗罗格纳,格鲁纳洛卡,老奥斯陆和圣汉舒根.
ref: 来自欧盟和欧洲经济区国家的人以及来自联合王国的人大多居住在弗洛格纳、格吕内尔洛卡、加姆勒奥斯陆和圣汉绍根。
paraphrase_llama3: The majority of people from the EU, EEA, and the UK resided in the neighborhoods of Frogner, Grünerløkka, Gamle Oslo, and St. Hanshaugen.

src: Meanwhile, while plenty of citizens from Asia, including Turkey, also resided in Game Oslo (5,837), the majority were registered as living in the boroughs of Alna, Stovner and Søndre Nordstrand.
mt: 虽然有很多来自亚洲的公民,包括土耳其,也居住在奥斯陆 (5837人),但大多数人被注册为居住在阿尔纳,斯托夫纳和索恩德诺德斯特兰德的城区.
ref: 与此同时，虽然包括土耳其在内的许多亚洲公民也居住在 Game Oslo （5837 人），但大多数人登记居住在阿尔纳、斯托弗纳和桑得雷·诺斯特兰德区。
paraphrase_llama3: While many Asian citizens, including those from Turkey, lived in Game Oslo, the majority of residents were actually registered in the neighborhoods of Alna, Stovner, and Søndre Nordstrand.

src: Gamle Oslo and Alna were the two parts of the city where the largest number of immigrants from Africa lived, along with Stovner, Grünerløkka and Søndre Norstrand.
mt: 旧奥斯陆和阿尔纳是城市的两个地区,那里的非洲移民人数最多,还有斯托夫纳,格鲁纳洛卡和索恩德尔诺斯特兰德.
ref: Gamle Oslo 和 Alna 是该市来自非洲的移民人数最多的两个地区，此外还有 Stovner、grünerl kka 和 Sø ndre Norstrand。
paraphrase_llama3: The majority of African immigrants in Oslo resided in the areas of Gamle Oslo, Alna, Stovner, Grünerløkka, and Søndre Norstrand.

src: Those from North America were spread fairly evenly across Frogner, Grünerløkka, Gamle Oslo, Vestre Aker and Nordre Aker.
mt: 那些来自北美的动物在弗罗格纳,格鲁纳洛卡,老奥斯陆,维斯特雷阿克和诺德雷阿克分布相对均.
ref: 来自北美的学生相当平均地分布在 Frogner、grünerl kka、Gamle Oslo、Vestre Aker 和 Nordre Aker。
paraphrase_llama3: The residents from North America were distributed relatively uniformly across the neighborhoods of Frogner, Grünerløkka, Gamle Oslo, Vestre Aker, and Nordre Ake

src: Citizens from South and Central America were most commonly found in Frogner, Grünerløkka, Gamle Oslo St.Hanshaugen and Sagene.
mt: 来自南美和中美洲的公民最常见于弗罗格纳,格鲁纳洛卡,古奥斯陆圣汉沙根和萨格内.
ref: 来自南美洲和中美洲的公民最常见于 Frogner、grünerl kka、Gamle Oslo St.Hanshaugen 和 Sagene。
paraphrase_llama3: The majority of South and Central American residents in Oslo are concentrated in the Frogner, Grünerløkka, Gamle Oslo, St.Hanshaugen and Sagene neighborhood

src: Europeans from outside the EU, EEA and UK tended to live in the town's most central borough, Ullern, Vestre Aker, Nordre Aker and Stovner.
mt: 来自欧盟,欧洲经济区和英国以外的欧洲人往往住在城市最中心的区,即Ullern,Vestre Aker,Nordre Aker和Stovner.
ref: 来自欧盟、欧洲经济区和英国以外的欧洲人倾向于居住在该镇最中心的区，即 Ullern、Vestre Aker、Nordre Aker 和 Stovner。
paraphrase_llama3: The majority of non-EU, non-EEA, and non-UK residents in the town reside in the central boroughs of Ullern, Vestre Aker, Nordre Aker, and Stovner.

src: And finally, of the several hundred nationals from Oceania, Frogner, Grünerløkka and Gamle Oslo were the boroughs with the highest populations of these nationals.
mt: 最后,在几百名来自大洋洲的国民中,弗罗格纳,格鲁内尔洛卡和老奥斯陆是这些国民人口最多的地区.
ref: 最后，在来自大洋洲的数百名国民中，弗洛格纳、格吕纳洛卡和加姆勒奥斯陆是这些国民人口最多的行政区。
paraphrase_llama3: Among the many nationals from Oceania, Frogner, Grünerløkka, and Gamle Oslo were the areas with the largest number of Oceania nationals.

src: Zimbabwe to Start Operating New Coal Power Unit by March
mt: 津巴布韦将在3月份开始运营新的煤电单元
ref: 津巴布韦将于三月开始运行新的煤电机组
paraphrase_llama3: Zimbabwe is expected to begin operating a new coal-fired power plant by the end of Marc

src: By Florence Tan
mt: 通过佛罗伦萨坦
ref: 记者：Florence Tan
paraphrase_llama3: Written by Florence Tan

src: BENGALURU (Reuters) - Zimbabwe will start operating a new unit at its only coal-fired power plant by March, says the country's deputy energy minister, providing relief to millions of citizens rocked by frequent power outages in recent months.
mt: 据该国能源部副部长称, 津巴布韦将在3月份开始运营其唯一的燃煤发电厂的新机组,
ref: BENGALURU（路透社）- 津巴布韦能源部副部长称，该国唯一的燃煤电厂将于 3 月开始运行一个新机组，为近几个月频繁停电的数百万公民提供救济。
paraphrase_llama3: Zimbabwe's energy minister announced that the country's only coal-fired power plant will begin operating a new unit by March, which is expected to alleviate the power outages that have been affecting millions of citizens in recent month

src: The new unit of the Hwange power plant will lift the African nation's installed capacity by more than 14% to 2400 megawatts.
mt: 据了解, 非洲国家已有超过14%的装机容量,
ref: 万基电厂的新机组将把这个非洲国家的装机容量提高 14% 以上，达到 2400 兆瓦。
paraphrase_llama3: The upcoming unit of the Hwange power plant will significantly increase Zimbabwe's electricity production capacity by 14% to 2400 megawatts.

src: The next unit is expected to be commissioned soon after, Magna Mudyiwa said, without giving a timeline.
mt: 马格纳穆迪瓦说, 预计下一个单位将很快投入使用,
ref: Magna Mudyiwa 说，下一个单元预计将很快投入使用，但没有给出时间表。
paraphrase_llama3: The next unit is expected to be operational in the near future, according to Magna Mudyiwa, although he did not provide a specific date.

src: Less than half of Zimbabwe's 16 million citizens have access to electricity, and a global squeeze on funding new coal-fired capacity has limited the country's ability to plug chronic power cuts that have lasted as long as 18 hours in recent days.
mt: 津巴布韦1600万居民中只有不到一半能获得电力, 全球对新燃煤发电能力的资金紧缩使该国无法应对长期停电,
ref: 津巴布韦 1600 万公民中只有不到一半的人用上了电，全球对新燃煤发电能力的资金短缺限制了该国解决长期停电问题的能力，最近几天，停电已经持续了 18 个小时。
paraphrase_llama3: In Zimbabwe, only a small proportion of the population has access to electricity, and due to a worldwide shortage of funding for new coal-fired power plants, the country is struggling to address its persistent power outages, which have lasted up to 18 hours in recent times.

src: "We have the capacity to generate up to 2100 megawatts (MW) from our power sources but at the moment we're generating far less than that..about 1000MW," Mudyiwa told Reuters.
mt: "我们有能力从我们的电源中产生高达2100兆瓦 (MW), 但目前我们产生的电量远低于这一点, 约1000兆瓦", 穆迪瓦告诉路透社.
ref: Mudyiwa 告诉路透社：“我们的发电能力高达 2100 兆瓦，但目前我们的发电量远远低于这个数字..大约 1000 兆瓦。”
paraphrase_llama3: "We have the potential to produce up to 2100 megawatts of power, but currently, we are only generating about half of that amount, which is around 1000 megawatts

src: "But our demand for electricity is about 1700MW so we have a serious deficit," she said.
mt: "但是我们对电力的需求约为1700兆瓦,
ref: 她表示：“但我们的电力需求约为 1700 兆瓦，因此我们有严重的缺口。”
paraphrase_llama3: "We have a significant shortage of electricity, as our daily demand is approximately 1700 megawatts."

src: Deficient rainfall has led to a decline in hydropower generation, while the efficiency of the sole, decades-old coal-fired utility has dipped sharply over time while power demand has surged in recent years due to higher mining and agricultural activity.
mt: 由于缺少降雨导致水电发电量下降, 几十年来唯一的燃煤电厂的效率随着时间的推移急剧下降,
ref: 降雨量不足导致水力发电量下降，而随着时间的推移，这家拥有数十年历史的唯一燃煤电厂的效率大幅下降，而近年来，由于采矿和农业活动增加，电力需求激增。
paraphrase_llama3: Insufficient rainfall has resulted in a decrease in hydroelectric power production, and the coal-fired power plant, which has been in operation for decades, has seen a significant decline in efficiency, as power consumption has increased due to rising mining and agricultural activity.

src: The International Monetary Fund counts electricity shortages as one of the major factors weighing on Zimbabwe's growth prospects.
mt: 国际货币基金组织认为电力短缺是影响津巴布韦经济增长前景的主要因素之一.
ref: 国际货币基金组织认为电力短缺是影响津巴布韦经济增长的主要因素之一。
paraphrase_llama3: Zimbabwe's economic growth is hindered by severe electricity shortages, which is a major concern for the International Monetary Fund.

src: Lack of funding for coal-fired power is driving the mining and agriculture-dependent economy to import costly power from regional neighbors including Zambia and Mozambique.
mt: 由于缺乏煤炭发电资金, 矿业和农业依赖的经济体不得不从邻国进口昂贵的电力,
ref: 燃煤发电缺乏资金正推动依赖矿业和农业的经济从赞比亚和莫桑比克等地区邻国进口昂贵的电力。
paraphrase_llama3: The coal-based power sector's financial constraints are forcing the region's mining and agriculture-based economy to rely on expensive electricity imports from neighboring countries like Zambia and Mozambique.

src: (Writing by Sudarshan Varadhan; Editing by Jacqueline Wong)
mt: 编辑: 杰克琳·
ref: （Sudarshan Varadhan 撰写；Jacqueline Wong 编辑）
paraphrase_llama3: A new study published in the journal Nature reveals that the brain's neural connections are more dynamic and adaptable than previously thought.

mt: 由于某种原因, 音频格式是错误的, 所以, 某种错误
ref: [PERSON11] 但是对于某些文件夹，由于某种原因，音频格式是错误的，所以，有些东西是错误的 -
paraphrase_llama3: Although some folders have the correct audio format, there are instances where the format is incorrect, leading to some confusion.

paraphrase_llama3: We should have the system prepared for use.

src: I looked at the tutorial from the NLP – was it?
mt: 我看了NLP的教程,

src: 3 1/2 Stars Remedy is a brothers best friend romance as well as a second chance romance mixed into one.

src: It's a unique story, and the hero (Grady) has to do everything to get Collins back and prove he's the guy for her.

src: Three years ago, Grady and Collins had an amazing night together.
mt: 三年前,格雷迪和柯林斯一起度过了一个美妙的夜晚.

src: Collins thought she was finally getting everything she dreamed of, her brothers best friend... but when she woke up alone the next morning, and never heard from her, things definitely changed.
mt: 柯林斯认为她终于得到了她梦以求的一切, 她的兄弟最好的朋友...
ref: 柯林斯认为她终于得到了她梦寐以求的一切，她哥哥最好的朋友...但是当她第二天早上独自醒来，再也没有她的消息时，事情就完全变了。
paraphrase_llama3: Collins believed she had achieved her long-held desires, thanks to her brother's close friend. However, when she awoke to find herself alone the following morning, with no word from him, her expectations were shattered.

src: Now Grady is back, and he's not leaving, and he's doing everything in his power to prove to her why he left, and that he's not giving her up this time around.
mt: 他正在尽一切可能向她证明他为什么离开,
ref: 现在格雷迪回来了，他不会离开，他正在尽一切努力向她证明他为什么离开，这次他不会放弃她。

src: While I loved the premise of this story, and at times Grady, he really got on my nerves.

src: I totally understand his reasoning for leaving that night, but to not even send a letter to Collins explaining himself?

ref: 我完全理解他那天晚上离开的理由，但是他甚至没有给柯林斯写一封信解释他的理由？

src: To leave her wondering and hurt for all those years, and then expect her to welcome him back with open arms?
mt: 让她多年来感到困惑和受伤, 然后期待她欢迎他回来?
ref: 让她困惑和受伤这么多年，然后期望她举双手欢迎他回来？

src: Was he delusional?!

ref: 我们的人手非常多，每年会磨损 2-3 个控制器。
paraphrase_llama3: Due to our aggressive gaming style, we frequently replace our controllers every 6-12 months.

src: So for us, making investments in controllers yearly means we have to be picky and prudent about what we purchase.
mt: 对于我们来说,每年在控制器上进行投资意味着我们必须对所购买的东西保持谨慎和挑.
ref: 所以对我们来说，每年在控制器上投资意味着我们必须对我们购买的东西保持精挑细选和谨慎的习惯。
paraphrase_llama3: We must be selective and cautious when buying controllers every year to ensure our investments are worthwhile.

src: The controller could do with more durable springs; after a couple months, buttons that are used the most stop responding and the right joystick loses it's centering, IE- makes map screens zoom in and characters walk forwards without even touching the controls.
mt: 控制器可以使用更耐用的弹; 几个月后, 那些被使用最多的按停止响应, 右手操纵杆失去它的中心, IE-使地图屏幕放大,
ref: 控制器可以使用更耐用的弹簧；几个月后，最常用的按钮停止响应，右操纵杆失去了它的中心，也就是说，使地图屏幕放大，字符前进，甚至无需触碰控制器。
paraphrase_llama3: The controller's springs are prone to wear and tear; after a few months, the frequently used buttons tend to malfunction, and the right joystick becomes unresponsive, causing unintended movements on the game scree

src: You get what you pay for
mt: 你得到的是你付出的
ref: 你的购物物有所值
paraphrase_llama3: Quality is directly proportional to the cost.

src: I was disappointed upon receiving this item as the silver part that goes around the face appeared to be made of some sort of cheap plastic.
mt: 收到这件物品后我感到失望,
ref: 收到这个东西时我很失望，因为脸部周围的银色部分似乎是由某种廉价塑料制成的。
paraphrase_llama3: When I got this item, I was let down because the silver trim that frames the face looked like it was made of low-quality plasti

src: It's not the fact that it was made of plastic that disappointed me as much as the fact that the plastic used made it look incredibly cheap.
mt: 让我失望的不是它是塑料制成的, 而是塑料的使用让它看起来非常便宜.
ref: 让我失望的不是它是由塑料制成的，而是所用塑料另其看起来非常廉价。
paraphrase_llama3: What really bothered me wasn't that it was made of plastic, but the cheap appearance it gave off due to the plastic used.

src: For me, this detail ruined the whole look for me.
mt: 对于我来说,这个细节毁了我整体的外观.
ref: 对我来说，这个细节毁了我的整体形象。
paraphrase_llama3: The presence of this detail completely marred the overall aesthetic for me.

src: I also did not trust it to hold up to everyday wear so I ended up returning it.
mt: 我也没有信任它能承受日常使用,
ref: 我认为它无法作为日常用品，所以我最终把它退了。
paraphrase_llama3: I didn't think it was sturdy enough for daily use, so I returned it.

src: I was disappointed because it seemed like it would have been a good deal if it had not been for that.
mt: 我很失望,因为如果没有那个,
ref: 我很失望，因为如果不是这样的话，这似乎会是一笔好的交易。
paraphrase_llama3: I was let down because it seemed like it would have been a great opportunity if it weren't for that one thing.

src: However, it you can overlook that, then it might be right for you.
mt: 尽管如此,如果你能忽略这一点, 那么它可能是对的.
ref: 然而，如果你可以忽略这一点，它就可能适合你。
paraphrase_llama3: If you can ignore that, it could be a good choice for you.

src: It was packaged well and did arrive quickly.
mt: 收到的邮件包装很好,
ref: 它包装得很好，而且很快就到了。
paraphrase_llama3: The item was carefully wrapped and arrived at my doorstep in no time.

src: Nothing like the previous Stylo phones, MASSIVE DISAPPOINTMENT.
mt: 没有任何类似于之前的Stylo手机,
ref: 与之前的 Stylo 手机完全不同，非常失望。
paraphrase_llama3: The new Stylo phones are a huge letdown compared to their predecessors.

src: I've had the original Stylo as well as the Stylo 2, Stylo 2 V and the Stylo 2 Plus.
mt: 我有了原来的Stylo,还有Stylo2,Stylo2V和Stylo2Plus.
ref: 我已经有了原来的 Stylo 以及 Stylo 2，Stylo 2 V 和 Stylo 2 Plus。
paraphrase_llama3: I've owned the Stylo series, starting with the original Stylo, and then upgrading to the Stylo 2, Stylo 2 V, and finally the Stylo 2 Plus.

src: Clearly I really liked the Stylos considering the fact that every time a new one came out, I purchased it.
mt: 显然我真的很喜欢笔,
ref: 很明显，我真的很喜欢触控笔，因为每次有新的触控笔出来，我都会购买。
paraphrase_llama3: I was a huge fan of the Stylos, and every time a new model was released, I couldn't resist buying it.

src: Never because one had issues or broke, just because I wanted to stay upgraded and "in the loop" and I did.
mt: 我只是想保持更新,并"了解情况",
ref: 从来不是因为一个人有问题或破产，只是因为我想保持升级和“在循环中”，我做到了。
paraphrase_llama3: I never upgraded because of any problems or failures, but because I wanted to stay current and informed.

src: Out of all of those phone's, not once did I ever had any problems with the phone's themselves.
mt: 没有一个手机本身给我带来任何问题.
ref: 在所有这些手机中，我从未遇到过手机本身有任何问题。
paraphrase_llama3: I never experienced any issues with the phone's functionality throughout my use of all those phones.

src: When I made this purchase for the Stylo 3 through Virgin Mobile, I just knew everything would go smoothly once I got the phone and set it up but I was very wrong in assuming that.
mt: 我知道一旦我拿到手机并设置它, 一切都会顺利,
ref: 当我通过 Virgin Mobile 购买 Stylo 3 时，我只知道一旦我拿到手机并设置好它，一切都会顺利进行，但我在这方面的假设是大错特错。
paraphrase_llama3: I had high expectations when I bought the Stylo 3 from Virgin Mobile, thinking that setting it up would be a breeze, but unfortunately, things didn't turn out as planne

src: This phone had so many issues that it honestly shocked me how the previous Stylos were so wonderful.
mt: 之前的手机是如此精彩,
ref: 这部手机有如此多的问题，它真的让我震惊，以前的触控笔是如此之好。
paraphrase_llama3: I was astonished by the stark contrast between the previous Stylos and this phone, which had an overwhelming number of problems.

src: I was never even able to sucessfully have this phone transferred to my Virgin Mobile account.
mt: 我甚至无法成功地将这部手机转移到我的维珍移动账户.
ref: 我甚至从来没有能够成功地将这部手机转移到我的 Virgin Mobile 账户。
paraphrase_llama3: Despite my efforts, I was unable to transfer this phone to my Virgin Mobile account.

src: I messed around for a little less than a week with this phone.
mt: 我用这个手机玩不到一周.
ref: 我摆弄这部手机还不到一周。
paraphrase_llama3: I experimented with this phone for about 6 days before getting frustrated.

src: I searched for information on the internet and made various calls desperately trying to give the Stylo 3 the benefit of the doubt hoping it was just me doing something wrong but sadly I wasted a lot of time doing so because it was 100% the phone having all the problems I didn't want to admit.
mt: 我在网上搜索了信息, 打了几次电话, 绝望地试图让Stylo 3获得疑问的好处,
ref: 我在互联网上搜索信息，打了各种电话，拼命试图给 Stylo 3 好处，只希望是我做错了，但可悲的是，我浪费了很多时间做这个，因为这个手机的所有问题是我接受不了的。
paraphrase_llama3: I spent hours scouring the internet and making frantic calls, trying to find a solution to the Stylo 3's issues, hoping it was just a user error on my part. Unfortunately, my efforts were in vain, as it became clear that the phone was indeed plagued with problems.

src: I hate the fact that I have to give a Stylo such a horrible rating and review but I was extremly disappointed with this phone.
mt: 虽然我不喜欢给Stylo这样的评价,
ref: 令我失望的是，我不得不给 Stylo 如此糟糕的评价和评论，但我对这款手机非常失望。
paraphrase_llama3: Despite my reluctance to criticize, I'm compelled to express my extreme disappointment with this phone, which warrants a poor rating.

src: Hopefully LG ups their game and can improve the future Stylos if there are any but this was a huge BUST.
mt: 让我们一起来看看.
ref: 这是一个巨大的败笔，如果可以的话，希望 LG 升级他们的游戏，并能改进未来的触控笔。
paraphrase_llama3: I'm expecting LG to enhance their performance and make better Stylos in the future, but unfortunately, this one was a massive disappointmen

src: On the bright side, the return and my refund went smoothly but that's about it.
mt: 幸运的是,退款和退款顺利进行,
ref: 从好的方面来看，退货和我的退款进展顺利，但仅此而已。
paraphrase_llama3: Although the return and refund process was a success, that's the only positive aspect.
